This is a good lightweight, general purpose tripod. It has all the bells and whistles (including bubble levels and quick-detach head) that you'd expect to see on a higher priced unit. For general light consumer use it's a good choice.Don't buy it expecting professional grade-if you're hard on your equipment, you'll need to move up in price and weight. For the occasional user, this is a great choice-it even comes with a carry bag.

I was a little hesitant on buying a cheap tripod because my last one broke so easily. When this came in it already felt a lot sturdier than the other tripod I had. This tripod is actually amazing for its price. I bought this when I bought a camera and started getting into photography more. I use this so often now and it is still holding up. Of course down the road I plan on getting something a little heavier for those strong winds but this works if you are just starting out.
For the price it’s not bad, but it is a bit light and doesn’t have a solid feel to it.  I don’t regret the purchase, but later I will buy a better one.

This is a great bargain in a decent, light weight tripod.  The tripod is very stable, even without adding a center weight.  I use it with a Canon DSLR, 300 mm lenses and a wireless remote shutter release.  Excellent for the money and comes with a decent carrying case.

Fantastic tripod and can't beat for the price.  The tripod itself is a very high quality.  Once your camera is mounted, it allows you to film/take pics horizontally and vertically with the flip of a lever.  The carry bag is great as well.  Would highly recommend.

Not high end but great tripods for the price. I bought modifiers to attach my cell phone. To keep it from tilting forward or back you have to twist the long handle. Took me a bit to figure that out. But these are great and affordable.
It’s a nice tripod. Sturdy enough for the simple videos I do in the comfort of my home. Lots of nice adjusting featureS

Step back in time to a world free of selfie sticks.... Oh that's what the self timer button does...  Bought for wife after we got a SLR camera (T5) for xmas. She like it, does everything a more expensive unit does. Everyone was facinated as it is "made" by amazon, quality product, light weight. Has a quick removable base attachment for cameras. The base can stay on your camera if you plan to use the tripod a lot and makes installing camera a breeze...a sweet summer breeze...laying in a hammock, sweet tea in hand.

I purchased this tripod to use with a pair of 15x70 binoculars for viewing wildlife and stargazing from our back window and deck.  It's worked very well and is a good height for me @ 6'0".  Great value, planning on using it for travel photos in the future.

I like this tripod, folds up easy, easy to set up, and large.  The only issue I have is if you're really excited about taking pictures and set it up to fast there's an O-ring at the bottom of the center shaft, if you open it up to fast it pops off and the slide goes down and gets stuck.  First time it happened it took my like 20 minutes to figure out what went wrong and fix it.  Since then I've only had it happen one more time.
Product will not stay tilted to look up to the sky.  You try to lock in place but it will not stay locked.Enjoy!!!
This is my first tripod and I wonder why I didn't get one ages ago. I'm still learning its many abilities but for the low price, I can't imagine a better deal.

Cheapest way to be a better photographer. Ever stop for a breathtaking shot? Keep one in the car, set up in 2 mins and get a better one. Supports the weight of my 11' tablet easily. 5 stars aren't enough here. $$ to value is my scale. this is a 10. I'd be happy paying around $40

A bargain for the price. Just ordered a second one, so really like this and it’s very adjustable. Probably not as slick as the morecexpensive ones, but seeing as it’s desogned for static photography in the main, it’s perfect.
This tripod works great for me. It's intuitive to use and easy to set up. Very lightweight and folds up slim. I use it occasionally.

I picked this up along with the AmazonBasics large gadget bag for backup and thing it was a really well-executed tripod, worth more than listed. I took a star off because the tripod itself has to many different type of adjustments that really make this a pain to setup and break down for on the go.

I am very pleased with the features, quality, and price of this tripod.  I had never purchased Amazon brand products before, but am pleasantly surprised with this purchase.  I purchased this after returning a similar product that was broken because of brittle plastic.  So, when I received this, I inspected it to check the quality.  I have a light-weight digital camera and plan to use this tripod for light to medium use.  For my level of use, I was not looking for an expensive professional grade.  I am please for what I got at the price I paid.  I have already taken this tripod out and am pleased with the ease of use and the features.

PEICE OF JUNK BROKE FIRST DAY YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR PLENTY OF OTHER OPTIONS 25$ down the drain. DO NOT BUY DO NOT Recommend. I REPEAT WOULD NOT Recommend. No instructions included. Piece of plastic junk.
I am impressed, use it often for several months now with no issues.Watch out for top heavy cameras.

As others have said, I'm surprised at the quality of this low-priced tripod. I wouldn't use it with a heavy medium-format camera, but for DSLRs, 35mm and iPhones it's a fine carry-around tool. Keep it in the car trunk so it's handy.

I've used this quite a few times and have been very pleased. It did get jammed once, but it was very easy to fix. No one believes me when I tell them how much it cost. I've set up next to people with nearly identical tripods who told me they paid 5 times as much for theirs. I assume they can only offer it this cheap because they are assembled by enslaved gnomes - but hey - I saved a few bucks!

This thing is perfect!!! First off, I am by no means a professional photographer. With that, I have been trying to make videos of handyman work, repairs, and renovations for my company website. I have also been looking into a way to document my hunts. This tripod seems great. It is lightweight, sturdy and seems easy enough to use. When you make an adjustment it stays there. It also has extendable legs that even when fully extended are study.
This is a very lightweight but solid product.

this tripod is great. i bought it without looking much into it and once i got it, i was surprised to fin that it had level indicators so that the camera can be stable and straight. i like the quick detachable base plate too. the tripod itself is very light and the bag seems very durable and i still have not had any issues with it. i am very happy with this product and would recommend it to anyone looking for a good and cheap tripod

The amazon basics are always a good choice and this is no exception. It is compact, has every point of adjustment you can think of, it has leveling guides for both the legs and the camera mount, plus it has the extra height adjustment at the top.

Amazing product for the price. The quick disconnect part of it seemed iffy at first, but then proved to be well worth the purchase. Keep in mind though that all the clamps are plastic, so as long as you mind what you are doing you'll love it too.

I bought this because my husband is a musician and needed promo videos.  I own a Nikon D3200 camera and this worked great.  It is sturdy, easy to work with, and folds up great for travel.  Works great for our purposes.

This is my first tripod. I really like how lightweight it is, and it is extremely easy to set up and take down. If I've got hands full with bags and cameras, I still don't have a difficult time setting it up. I'm not sure how it would compare to other tripods, but for what I need it for, its great! I use it for my DSLR camera to capture time lapses. This tripod is great for me.

I love love love this tripod it does so many things even still now I've had it for about a week and I'm discovering little things I didn't even notice, it's super lightweight lots of adjustable features. I can't wait to break this bad boy out and the price beats everyone else.
Very low quality, plastic locks come out after couple of uses..
this tripod doesnt come with a bag. it works ok. it is hard to adjust the horizontal and vertical direction of hte camera. would not buy again.
My last tripod was aluminum as well. this one is thicker. the telescoping head is nice. Head rotates nicely.

Nice tripod but I’m not sure I’d call this light weight and portable. If didn’t fit in my 70 lt backpack and it’s pretty clunky. There are other options out their if you’re looking for lightweight and compact. This just isn’t it.  But it well made so it could work for a different customer.
The knob that locks the stand horizontally does not work... The clip that screws on the base of the camera failed and my camera fell off!

Everything about it seems fine, you get what you pay for. My only issue at the moment is with the locking screw for the base plate not tightening properly. Works for what I need as a beginner photographer but wouldn't recommend to people attempting to anything serious.
I love this tripod. I took it hunting and it was a life saver. Very light weight and durable. It's a great value.

Price is reasonable. It is light and easy to attach to my photo bag with little obstruction. It is sturdy, easy to set up quickly and has a hook at the bottom of the center pole to allow additional weight to be added to make it more stable. Best value for the money.
Great Tripod! It works great, the only issue I have is when I need to turn the neck and pain around with the camera, it’s a bit rough but over all a great Amazon product!
Obviously you get what you pay for, don't buy this crap, fell apart immediately.

You get 2 for the price of 1 that's always a plus. Nice height and maneuverability. My husband likes it alot. I'm waiting till I can buy a remote motorized pan head then I'll post a review on how it worked for me but it is a very good buy for the price point
Great Stand
Stop looking for other tripods and buy this. It's a durable, sturdy stand that'll serve any need you need
I really want to like this tripod, but it has one major flaw: no matter how much I loosen the knob, it will not pan smoothly. I even tried lubricating the joint. Nope. Herky-jerky. 😕

I purchased two of theses tripods, one for each car when I'm on site traveling. My first one works great with no issues. The second one I purchased, the rivets in the arm came loose. The arms are no longer attached to the body, and no longer stands like a tripod. I really like Amazon Basic products are most of the products are great, but this is the first product that I had problems with.

Bought this because Of the overall reviews, but one of the rubber feet fell over and now the tripod is lopsided and there seems to me no replacement parts.  It may be a “little” part, but part makes a major difference when it helps to hold up thousands of dollars in camera equipment.

This product was advertised as "refurbished - like new." It came with the plate clamp detached (I'm pointing to the bare spring in this photo), loose in the box. It also came without the shoe/plate that mounts the camera to the tripod. Overall, this product was being sold with a very loose definition of "like new."

This product is awesome! I film videos a lot and it works really well. Very light weight, versatile, and extremely sturdy! I film for a challen called funsizetechreviews on youtube so make sure to check out some of my vids if u want to see how using this thing is!Ill do a review of the product very soon!
The best product to start becoming a professional

I just discovered Amazon's own brand of photographer equipment - and I'm so thankful I did! I've only had it for a few months, but product has still held up nicely. Great value.Tripod is sturdy, but lightweight, and easily adjustable. Having clips to expand different sections of each leg is awesome for adapting the tripod for various uses and situations. I can't wait to see what other equipment AmazonBasics releases for photographers!

Great price and I didn't have high expectations because the price was super reasonable.  I am super happy with this buy.  I am sure if you are a "professional" photographer you may want to have this as a back up.  But for everyday photographers and video folks this is perfect!! It is light weight, versatile and easy to use.  I would recommend it to anyone, at any skill level.  Just a great buy, why pay 2x or 3x times as much for a product that isn't near the quality?

The only issue I had was that it came without any directions. I've never had a tripod before so it took me some time to figure out a couple things. Hasn't tipped over, even with my toddlers trying to crawl under it.

Love this item, it's very solid and nice the only reason I didn't give it a 5 stars is because the pan side to side rotation is not smooth, it kind of shakes in a funny way when you move it, however that doesn't make it a bad item at all I really like it and recommend it.

I have never owned a tripod for my camera, but decided to go with this AmazonBasics version due to value.  I'm impressed, it works smoothly and is easy to setup or put away.  It is pretty lightweight considering other options, but I think that if I find I get good use out of it and want to have something a little more lightweight and bulky, I will eventually order a different one.  Couldn't complain for a beginner's piece though!

Quite disappointed with this tripod. I believe the handle to adjust the camera height was stripped  when I got it, and it does not screw into anything. Was trying to use this for some heavier binoculars, but they kept rotating and sliding down because this could not lock their weight down. Will buy a better quality one next time.

What I like: This tripod is very lightweight, easy to set up and tear down and folds down small to make it easy for travel. Also, with that price tag you can't go wrong. There are far better tripods out there but you'll pay for them, and I'm keeping that in mind with my rating.What I don't like: This is perfect for indoor shooting. However, I tried this for some night shots and even with a slight breeze it will move the tripod enough to blur your shots. If your intention is outdoor shooting, especially at night with a slow shutter, I would recommend investing in something more expensive.
Did not hold the adapter securely so the binoculars fell off and broke. The screw appears to be too short to attach securely or else the adapter has a problem.
mine has little bubble levels crank works well nice fat zipper on bagnag is good looking not flimsey
Good product and good price. It comes with a bag so you can pack it and it’s so easy to put it together
For the price, you can not go wrong. I've looked at similar ones in stores that only reach 51", and they are triple the price. Very well made

If you want a good quality tripod for under $30 bucks this one is great! I bought the cheaper Amazon basics 50" and it is not anywhere near as good as this one!! The 60" is much more stable and sturdy!

Amazingly solid tripod for the price, not flimsy in any way, shape or form! Plus it has a built in level, carry handle, little hook on the bottom which I use for cables, & it has a detachable top mount with quick release. This tripod is the bomb!

I really needed a sturdy tripod and I love Amazon, so it made sense for me to get an AmazonBasics tripod. I use this tripod with a mount for my smartphone to take pictures and it works very well. This is definitely a mid-range product, a lot more durable than cheapy tripods at Walmart, but not as solid feeling as professional photography tripods.

the screw cannot get close enough to be screwed in.  On other tripods, the peg is supposed to recess into the plate if there is no hole in the camera but this one will not do that for me.  Not sure if it's broken or this is the way it's made.

I LOVE this tripod. I would buy it again in a heartbeat. It is the perfect height, and very sturdy and durable. One thing I noticed that nobody has commented on was the leveler! It has one, and I noticed it wasn't in the description that it did. This is the tripod to get, I love it with my GoPro!
AmazonBasics 60-Inch Lightweight Tripod with BagWell built, sturdy and easy to setup and extend

We have used it maybe 5 times for a laser level and one leg is already broken! We might be able to glue  it back together, but not really happy that it needs to be done. Super lightweight and easy to use though!

AMAZING!!!! This tripod took my photography to the next level. I am so impressed with the quality of this product for such a great price. Definitely recommend for anyone who take photos or would like to take self-timed portraits of their family. Really fantastic and had more bells & whistles than I even realized before I bought it.

Clip doesn't fit well on smaller (mirrorless) cameras, have to take it off often. Lost it already and had to buy a new one. Tripod feels bulky, and seems to be off-kilter no matter how much I adjust it. On the plus side, it's lightweight and sturdy, and easy to set up. Not impressed overall, but you get what you pay for I guess.
Light weight and easy to carry. The handle was a great addition compared to other cheaper tripods that I have tried. I would surely buy again. Great item and easy to setup or break down.

My tripod broke exactly 30 days after purchasing it. I would recommend investing a little more for something that will last longer than a month. Also, I'm pretty easy on my things. I didn't do anything to break it. The leg just broke on the inside WHILE my camera was on it. Not cool.But, the awesome news is I caught my camera mid-fall, and Amazon is replacing it free of charge! Woohoo! Amazon has amazing customer service. Let's hope my next one lasts a lot longer than one month.
I’m no professional but this is lightweight, durable and I’m 5’10 and it goes well above what is needed for my height although it’s not hard or heavy to carry. Definitely recommend!

This tripod does very well for what I wanted it for. I can adjust the way I have my camera easily and it goes back in the bag it comes with pretty well. My only gripe it that it easily gets scratched where you put the camera. Aside from that, this is a great tripod to add to your collection or to start out with in your photography or filmography adventures.
Pretty good for the price. Only thing is the rotation is not smooth at all, cuz it's plastic on Plastic but it's great.
OH.  MY.  GOSH.  This thing is almost as tall as my dad,  standing completely at its highest!  I bought this so that I can hold up a really long wig,  and it more than meets the requirements.

It's a $23 tripod. Lightweight, easy to carry on hikes. Not very durable. Toddler knocked it over easily and one of the clamps broke right off. It still functions, more or less. In retrospect, I would have purchased a heavier, more durable one. Might have withstood the toddler.

I have not used the tripod as of yet, due to bad weather.  I have found it to be of high quality and and it looks well made and very sturdy.  The items that Amazon has under their name are inexpensive but that is deceiving.  They are as good as their competitors.  I have also bought a tablet case by Amazon and both are better than I expected.  Don't let the price be your only criteria, give Amazon a try, I think you will be happy with your choice!
Very light and compact when stored, but also very stable when set up. I used this with an IPow tablet mount to hold a 10 inch tablet for a photo booth at a wedding, worked perfectly.
it does hold my Nikon camera my cellular phone and iPad you need a special piece for cellular and iPad
This is the best quality tripod I've ever had, for the quality is amazing what arrived at your door. Easy to use and transport. I definitely recommend this.

I should've opted for another brand, I usually trust Amazon but this has been disappointing. The stand on top makes a nasty clicking noise when I rotate it, I recorded a video this past weekend and it has been such a nightmare to remove the clicking sound! Otherwise... light, functions as expected.

This tripod is very light weight. But with it being lightweight it is very durable no corners were cut when building this bad boy. It has a built in level and everything, if you're looking for a very well built and durable tripod look no further is the one for you.

This tripod is well-suited for amateur use, providing a good, stable base for pictures or video, without being terribly expensive. It did not come with instructions, but it is not difficult to figure out the various functions. With my camera (which weighs 18 oz/0.5 kg) mounted, the tripod is a little wobbly when extended to its absolute highest, but this can be mostly counteracted by hanging a bit of weight off of the hook on the bottom of the central shaft. All told, I am very pleased with this tripod.

I am giving you guys an extra star because the tripod did work as intended but not for very long.  Last week when I took out my tripod, the strap on the bag broke.  Then when I extended one of the legs, the leg just came right out.  I mean I know this is a pretty cheap tripod but I did not expect it to be this cheap, especially coming from Amazon.  Please look in to this issue and if there is any way to repair this please let me know.  Thanks.

Got the wrong item, Amazon replaces immediately for me and I’m very happy with my purchase, the tripod is tall enough fits my cannon perfectly and I love that it comes with a carrying case. Quality material looks great.

I love it. I am more of an action photographer so I never needed a tripod before, but this summer i'll be doing some landscape shots. This fits the bill perfectly. Very sturdy, well made, Amazon Basics delivers again. The swivel at the top at the head with the handle is very nice and smooth. Moves both vertical and horizontal. I'm so glad I purchased this as my first lightweight tripod. Great choice.

This tripod has been great! Its been super sturdy and easy to adjust. It has also held up after being taken on the beach for about a week straight, so that shows its very durable and will hold up. Its a bit bulky but the durability makes up for this!
I am an amateur photographer. This is my first tripod I ever owned. I like it so much. Such a great value for the price. I highly recommend it.

Wow... so impressed at the quality for the price!  I was floored when I got it in the mail.  My only issue is the little spring tab button thing on the quick release base.  I have a sony digital and bottom of the camera is not flat.  The little spring-up metal button (not sure why this is even there) doesn't allow easy screw on of the camera to the quick release base.  So I had to tape it down to screw the camera to the quick release base.  But otherwise great quality!!!
This was too large for what I wanted, but just a quick look at it and it seemed sturdy for the inexpensive cost.
Really impressed with the professional features of this tripod. Wouldn't say this is the most durable for actual professional use, but for occasional users, this is perfect. Awesome value!
Went up from Kansas city Missouri to Cheyenne Wyoming to film and chase the UP 4014 bought this and loved it!Worth the money and easy to use. Can get a little unbalanced in wind though.

I have no complaints.  The product name says it all, this is a basic lightweight tripod.  Works well for my Nikon.  It may not have a ll the "bells and whistles" put should be adequate for any beginner.

This tripod is so much better than I thought it was going to be. I guess thats my own fault for not looking at the pictures or description but at least it was a good suprise.I love this tripod it is a very good deal.

A little too lightweight BUT it does the job. I would not use it in a very windy location but for calm winds or indoors without children running around or overly curious pets, it is fine.Easy to use and easy to carry, camera sits just right (and firmly so)
Can't beat the price, easy to use.  Very lightweight so you can weight it down using the center hook. We mounted a tablet to it and used it as a video camera setup.
Great product, very light and tips over easily but it’s in the name so I should have expected that

You're getting the value for what you paid for. There are some issues with when I pull out the tripod and there's some black residue that i'm not familiar with? I suppose it's the plastic rubbing off.. but other than that. everything else is pretty simple to use and works as intended.

This is a basic tripod and will satisfy your basic requirements.  It is not level and I have to extend one leg to get it right.  The movements are a bit jerky but I have learned how to make it work for what we need.  Easy to use.  Easy to set up.
I purchased this item to use with my laser level. It works great! I have not a single complaint. It does the job!

Best tripod I've purchased. Originally bought as a money saver (in 2014), but this tripod has proven to be a great buy. Granted, it wouldn't stand up against a strong Kansas wind, but it's lightweight and easy to use.

Pretty decent for the price. After almost a year of having it, it is still sturdy buy the tilting leveler is slightly loose and cannot find a way to fix it. It prevents me from angling my camera for still photography/recording. Got a good use out of it but I am probably going to spend a little more on a better tripod that will last me longer.

It is inexpensive but still looks great. It is very lightweight but at no point feels low quality. The structure is strong and sturdy and can easliy hold point-and-shoot cameras or basic camcorders. It comes with a nice carry bag with shoulder strap which makes it easier to carry. It is fully adjustable and easy to use.

Great great great! For the price it's awesome. You can feel every parts are well made with smooth feelings. As compared to my cheap one from the accessory of lens purchase, this one has way better quality. The only issue so far is that it's a little heavy to me although is came with a nice bag which helps you to hold it easily.
After trying several other tripods, this was finally the right one! Very easy to use and sturdy. Highly recommend.

This is a very good tripod for the money. Even though it may be inexpensive, It is more stable and durable than many more expensive tripods. The included level is a nice touch, and it has all of the standard adjustments found in more expensive tripods. I have yet to have any problems with it, and would recommend it to anyone looking for a cheap/disposable tripod. The included carrying bag works well, and has a shoulder strap for easy carrying.
Very pleased with this camera tripod. Purchased this for annual family photos. Was very easy to use and was sturdy. Very good quality.
other then the swivel head for turning is too tight, now i will probably need to damage it just to loosen it up!its real stable for mid to larger DSLR CAMERAS

I bought this tripod to replace one that broke. I knew this would be a lightweight and wasn't expecting a heavy duty tripod. Unfortunately this is so lightweight is is essentially useless. The tripod literally vibrates simply from me walking around; I get sharper photos going handheld.

My backup tripod and for the cost rivals some of the more expensive models on the market. Great entry tripod for the enthusiast just expanding their photography tools. I use mine for tutorial YouTube videos and steady shots when not in a rush. Stashes away in the bag easily and goes with me on each outing. Straps to my camera bag for convenience. The one thing that I've never seen and wish would be an option is to have more than one quick release platforms so I can have one already attached to each of my cameras (hint, hint).
Overall pretty good, especially for the price. No real complaints. Its not heavy duty, but for a phone camera it is an amazing improvement in terms of shot stability.
The component that acts as a "foot" to secure camera to tripod was missing.  Sorely disappointed

Great little tripod! I bought this to use with my Canon Rebel S 35mm camera for my Intro to Black and White Photography Class. Capturing images on film makes having a tripod essential, especially for slow shutter speed or prolonged exposures.PROS: Lightweight, carry/storage bag with adjustable strap and the handle make it easy to carry. The quick release works great I used it with my still image and video cameras. Easy &  smooth deployment of leg extensions, open the clip and they drop down.
Seems very well made however I would not leave my camera sitting on the tripod if a gust of wind blew I'm sure it would tip over
Great tripods and it’s a two pack so I have one for each of my cameras now. And it was a deal of the day so I got it at an even better price!
if you put marks on the inside legs, and telescoping neck.you can have a very quick, and precise setup!

This was a product I have accidentally seen. I was not sure to buy , but then I wanted to give it a try (Actually i did buy this for my little brother, who was a beginner in SLR)it came out really great. Quite stable , and more than I was expecting and it has a proper bag to make it easier to carry around. It has a solid aluminum + plastic  body and can extend to a maximum height a person might need
I was worried that I wouldn’t be able to find a tripod sturdy enough to support my 12.9” iPad. This tripod is STURDY! Really impressed with the quality.
This Amazon tripod is so awesome. Perfect to take with you- it comes in a little carrying case and is super easy to use! So happy with this purchase and the price.

A great tripod value. No complaints. Mounting plate and head are pretty secure. Not a very stable tripod as it's light as a feather. The crank center post adjuster is often a bit stiction-y but otherwise, a good tripod that sees a lot of rough use with smaller point and shoots and my small prosumer video cam. It is not that stable with my Nikon D90 with the 18-200 VR lens and a flash on it. For hard work, I use my carbon fiber Manfrotto.
Awesome product. Worth the buy. Especially for those first timers just getting into photography

Works ok for stationary use. Doesn't move smoothly but you can set it up and point it at something and take video which is what I'm using it for. If you want something you can smoothly pan with you make want to look elsewhere for something more expensive.
this has slightly better controls (hand crank lift, tool free quick release camera mount clip). Competitively priced also. Value for money inexpensive tripod.

I purchased this tripod for use with my Canon T3 and 70-300 lens. T3 is a lighter DSLR, soI was confident this would handle the load. My first excursion was using it to shoot some 4th of July fireworks, and it performed like a champ! Had it out on another night shoot doing some light trails, and it has proven great! Set-up is quick and easy with the easy lock legs. Camera snaps into place, and is easy to mount. This was just what I needed at the price I could afford!

I purchased this tripod to mate with a small projector. I am always on a tight budget an immediately looked at the Amazon Basics options. I found this and the height was what I needed and so were the features. What I couldn't say no to was the price.This tripod features a square aluminum framing, which always feels strong and stable and never do I feel my projector is in danger. The mounting head contains a quick disconnect mount and features full adjustability. You can adjust your angles up and down, left and right and vertical. So I can adjust my projector to get the image perfectly aligned and even point it at the ceiling.

For the price this is a great step-up, sturdy tripod. I've been putting it through some fairly tough tests this winter and its been pleasant to work with. Another plus, your not so edgy about possibly bending a leg or compromising it too much because its fairly inexpensive. Definite quality though....
Don't expect perfection with something this price, but it does a great job.  Worked perfect with our Nikon D3500.

It's great for the price. It's not in any way a replacement for a professional one. It simply isn't up to par w/ the big boys.If you're doing mainly static shots.. it'll do the job. But if you're planning on panning, swiveling up and down during a shot. No way. It is not smooth at all. Super herky jerky. Just doesn't have the bearings and glide ability as the more expensive ones. You do get what you pay for, but this is great for the price.

I am not by any means a advanced photographer but for the criteria I set forth, I wanted light weight, ease of use, and simple but yet functional.  I got these features and more. I especially love the built in levels and the plate that stays on the camera for quick use. Not to mention the quick release clips for the legs. This is by no means cheep, and it is not top of the line expensive either, but I am truly hoping, with a little care and considerate use it will last.

I ordered this tripod with very low expectations. Thought that for this Price was almost imposible to get a good product.Well, I was completely wrong. This tripod is excellent for I'd say 95% of commmon 'amateur' situations in which you need to use a tripod.
This was a great purchase I have an older Nikon camera so that fact that it works with it is great I have a D3100 camera
Considering the cost from warehouse deals  this is a GREAT BUY! I wont say its a heavy duty tripod but for the use I will have with it I highly recommend.

You can see by all the positive reviews that it’s a very quality product I have absolutely no complaints anything and everything that I could say positive is what I would put in this review honestly Amazon killed it with this one.

I've been buying the cheap Walmart camera stands for awhile now, and this is WAY better for the same price. Walmart's rigs are cheap, plastic, and break quickly, but this is made out of a much more sturdy material and much stronger design. There is no way I'll buy another cheap tripod again, this will be my go-to. It may be cheap, but it is very reliable.

For a photographer that's always on the move, it's fantastic! I love that I can attach to my camera bag and it doesn't add much additional bulk or weight.When shooting on a windy day, I do need to stabilize. I am always near my tripod with camera on but if you needed to walk away, I would use some weight. There's a handy little hook to add your camera bag or something else under the tripod to stabalize.

The tripod is light and comes with a carrying case, making it extremely portable. This tripod is a good tripod for the price, but the adjustments are not smooth enough for any telephoto work, and tightening the adjustment handles caused the point of aim to move slightly... for casual photography or anything within a few dozen feet this will probably work out great. Don't try to use it with any larger telephoto lenses, spotting scopes or telescopes, this will not work well in those applications based on my experience.
I ordered this , loved it... i lost the bag for it, contacted to see if i could just buy a bag by itself and they were so nice they sent me a new tripod and bag!!!! I wish everyone was like them!

...first tripod I ever bought that I couldn’t just mount whatever I owned...built-in plate system, non-removable, not compatible with my own setup(s)...probably very reasonable performer if your plate system matches...(and I didn’t buy an AmazonBadic tripod expecting to also have to replace the head before I could use it)...returned, with regrets—I just wanted a basic tripod!...
Very light weight. Easy to use

This is a GREAT tripod for a really nice price!  It does all the things you would expect a tripod to do and does them smoothly.  It feels very sturdy and you can adjust it easily.  It comes with a carrying bag which is nice as well.  Amazon has done a great job with this one!
This thing is light but very solid. Great item for the price. Very pleased and I do recommend it.

Received and put it away for while, when I get it out only to find it is a defect product. On of the knot is not working, so the camera was just tilting to one side. Too bad it is passed the return date so I can’t do anything m... should buy a brand tripod next time instead of the cheap amazon basic product.

Took about six months before one of the latches broke. Still functional but just kind of awkward to handle. This is the second one I've purchased (previous one lasted about a year.) However for the price they're not bad.

I am not an optimist,  but I've not found any complaints with this.  It was my first Amazon Basics product purchase, but won't be my last.  My daughter is using it, along with an iPad mount, to make her own "movies".  It is simple enough that elementary agreed kids can use it, but feature rich and perfect for an adult too.

It is OK for the price and will do the job. Not a professional model by any means, but reasonable for light use, but would not recommend it for heavy or rough useage. Camera weight could be an issue, but then if you are doing regular work a more substantial product is in order. For today's lightweight cameras and occasional use it will do just fine.
This tripod worked fine until I unscrewed the part of the head that tilts the camera and now it won’t screw back in place.

This is a really nice tripod for under $30. I'd expect to pay 2-3x that at the blue and yellow electronics chain. It's very adjustable and works perfectly with standard adapters. I tried it with an iPad mini and an iPhone and it did the trick nicely. The shoulder case is nice for storage in the car trunk, etc. I'd buy it again.

There is so much "bling" on this thing in terms of functionality that I didn't know about. I was totally surprised. The "crank up" extension was awesome. The clip on and clip off connector to the camera. A hook to hang a weight if needed. Little bubble levelers everywhere to make sure the thing is level no matter how it's situated.For the price, I thought I was getting a lower model. This tripod is better not only than I expected but than any other tripod I've ever purchased.

Awesome build quality. Everything is as I expected and very nice materials . After not finding what I wanted in best buy or a trip to walmart I decided to order this . I'm very happy I did it is so easy to open and close and seems like a great tripod for the money. I look forward to using this for my fpv flying  as it will hold my Vue XL fpv goggle/screen. And I'll also use it with my Nikon.
It is easy to carry and just as easy to use. I like the balance window so you know your camera is level.

Features and capability that wildly exceed its cost. Really well thought-out. I'll bet you could make a small profit buying these off Amazon and selling them at a garage sale, that's how good a value these are.

Very surprised on how nice this tripod is. It's very light weight to carry over my shoulder or pick up with one hand with my camera on top. The hook on the bottom for weights holds my camera bag perfectly off the ground while I work.
It was a replacement for one I had broken.  It's lightweight, easy to transport, set up and use, perfect for livestream or event coverage.
Does the job. Happy with my purchase. I use it for my 13 inch ipad pro and it holds it well. Pretty sturdy. Recommend the buy.

I LOVE this tripod and I can’t believd how cheap it is! I’m by no means a photographer, but I do run a Lifestyle blog (chiataglance.com) and I need a tripod for certain shoots I do.The Tripod comes with no instructions, but googling a few you tube videos I was all set! It’s so easy to use and sturdy, I love that the height is adjustable and it can swivel from side to side. It’s also light weight and comes with a carrying bag. As of now I have no compliants at all. :)
I remember when tripods like this were $60 and better. Lower price perfect product. And it’s super lightweight!
It's been very supportive. No issues with my Nikon d3000 mounting on it. The only thing I have a slight issue with is that it can be difficult to turn. But it's better than having too much movement.
This tripod was way to set up and love that it goes up to 5ft! It has a carrying case and very versatile as far as being able to adjust all parts for different angles. Great for a beginner like me!

Convenient, small and super cheap tripod for a camera that doesn't move.  I use it for my b-cam on interviews.  I can cram it into my nicer tripod's bag and get a two-for without having to carry twice the stuff.
Nice product. Very sturdy. Does the job.Folds up nice and easy to carry around.
I absolutely love this. It’s bigger than the last thing I had and sturdier. Easy to manage. Very stable.

The Amazon Basics 60-inch Tripod with Bag is quite nice.  It does everything I need for bird photography out my picture window, and then some.BUT BUYER BEWARE - PARTS ARE NOT ONLY UNAVAILABLE, BUT AmazonBasics DOES NOT GIVE YOU A CLUE WHERE TO FIND THEM.  SHAME, SHAME, SHAME ON THEM!
Nice affordable tripod. Use it with a heavy spotting scope for astronomy.

For under $30, this tripod does the trick. We purchased this to use for our projector when we do movies outside, and it works like a charm. Not a lot of bells and whistles, but we weren't looking for those. Comes with a nifty little bag, stays fairly sturdy when set up and has a hook at the center to hand something weighted for extra stability. Looking for an affordable tripod? This is it.
Holds my SONY Handy cam just fine.  Light but I think it is going to hold up fine for my infrequent usage.

I love this tripod.  It is super easy to assemble.  Sets up fast.  It has a lot of bells and whistles like a level gauge and also a camera mount that disengages quickly from the base.  It works well because my camera is a lighter DSLR without a long lens.  Heavier camera users may want to research something sturdier.

This is a good reliable and stable tripod. However is is very difficult to pan from left to right or vise versa. It make the image jump on the camera as this function is very stiff. This is with the locking mechanism fully disengaged.Otherwise I find this to be a good tripod.
Great product and holds camera perfect. Can adjust to all different heights and angles. Very stable and easy to use.

After trying another tripod for around the same price, this is really something for the price. The other tripod I used broke within 2 days. I purchased the 60 inch one and so far I’m really proud of it. I’ve had this for about a year and it still works brand new. It may not be a ball head tripod but after using this, I almost always get my products from amazon basics whenever I have the chance.

I opened it up and was pleasantly suprised. I thought it was decent quality and the bag to carry was a plus ESP for the price of it. I literally was about to log on to write a raving review and then a part snapped off! Not sure what purpose it serves and I need this for an event tomorrow so I'll just deal with it. But I only un hooked it TWICE and it snapped completely off within 10 mins after opening my package so bummed about that. Plus side was quick shipping, easy packaging and great price were what the other stars were for.

I'm very pleased the tripod is very sturdy even for my heavier Nikon 300mm lens.  It's nicely designed and flexible that helped my camera shake issues.  I'm now taking sharper photos without the need for an expensive tripod.

It's tough to really rate this product. I purchased this tripod based on a recommendation. Never having owned one before, I didn't realize how complicated it could be at first glance. Instructions, please!! For all of you other first-time tripod owners, be sure to buy one with instructions... Haven't had time to figure it out :(
Seems okay but mine did not come with the quick release mounting bracket so I'm returning.

Not much to say other than it does a great job! I kept borrowing my wife's old tripod but it was well worn and used (she is a professional photographer). This tripod is sturdy, holds either here Nikon or a video camera just fine. No issues at all. If you need a tripod I don't see any reason why you wouldn't purchase this one.
I got more than I bargained for.  2 on-board levels and may adjustable joints to get the right angle.  Lightweight with handle and carrying case. Great value.  Packaged well and arrived quickly.

I bought this last minute before my aurora chasing trip to Iceland. It it very lightweight and did the job just fine. I managed to get some really good photos thanks to this tripod. If only the remote i bough worked it would have been perfect. I recommend this product.

Thought Amazon product has the quality and price.  I only use this one to record the Moon before. After the 3rd time use. The joints are broken. All three legs. Looks like it is cheaply made.  Amazon just sent a replacement.  I doubt this one can last long
This one is lightweight enough to transport with ease.  It IS okay to have more than one!
This has been an amazing tripod! I use it often and have had no problems. I love how easy it is to get set up and the camera attaches and disconnects so easily. I would defintely recomend it.

For me it’s not a lightweight if you want to take it for a backpacking and it’s bulky. I have to return it and find a much a lighter one. It sucks that they deduct $7 something to return... like really? Customer satisfaction!
Excellent product and excellent quality. you cannot ask anything more in a tripod. Its around a feet long after collapsing.

Love this tripod, couldn't ask for something much better for a beginner photographer we have brought this out to multiple spots it loads and unloads very quickly and the levels are spot on, if you are looking for a good tripod for a great price and don't need all the extras I definitely recommend this one!
Don't waste your money on this. Save a little money and get a slightly more expensive one.

Great for a casual photographer like myself. I have a 3 month old baby girl and a camera that is far too advanced for me, so I wanted to finally learn how to use it and get some great shots of the baby as she grows! It's sturdy enough for home and casual use, but don't take it backpacking or anything, it isn't THAT rugged. I only wish that the legs would "spread" a little wider so I can get the camera lower to the ground. Might help capture those "learning to crawl" moments.
I have seen many complaints for this tripod.  I have zero to complain about with it.  Lightweight and comes with a transport bag.  Ready to go right out of the box.
Easy to use and great functionality! Durable and steady and adjusts to various heights. I use a Panasonic LUMIX camera and it attached with no problem.

This tripod is a little beast, extremely versatile in what it can do for the price but it's definitely not meant for rough terrains, hiking, or rain. It will definitely get the job done for your average everyday needs
This has worked great ! I am new at making videos and was needing a durable but affordable tripod and this worked great for my needs !

I use this for family videos and have much enjoyed it. No issues at all. I wish it operated a little more smoothly but for the price I am VERY happy. Sometimes we keep it set up ready to go for unexpected opportunities.
USING THIS TRIPOD WITH A COMPASS MOUNTED TO IT TO ALIGN A WEATHER STATION POINTING "NORTH"

Product came exactly as described, in a small lightweight carrying case. The tripod seems sturdy, has two different settings to extend legs to about 6' tall, and has two spirit levels which is great. Perfect for amateurs, not sure about professional photographers-- but it seems like it will do the job well.

This thing has proven to be pretty great so far. I've used it for product photography in a studio as well as outdoors (where I'd really rather be ;). It's very adjustable and the bubble level is a very nice feature that my last tripod did not have.
This is a great value for a fine tripod. Light and strong, and easily to carry in its nylon case.

I received one as a gift and bought a second one, ended up lasting longer than a different product my son bought, he made fun of my cheap Amazon tripod yet my first one is in as perfect condition as the day I received it 4 years ago, haha guess my Amazon tripod isn't so cheap after all! I use mine more frequently then he ever has and have had mine longer :) it's great!
Its not heavy duty, but is cheap, and works great. My biggest gripe is that when it's toasted 90 degrees down you can see the tripod legs. I got sun education round though and that fixed it up great!

This is a great starter tripod! I needed something for my occasional video recordings, and this does the job very nicely. Lightweight, easy to set up and pack up. The carrying case is a nice addition as well. I like the amount of tweaking you can do with the height, and the head is easy to adjust. The bubble levels are a nice touch that make it easy to take nice level videos or photos.

Not the best tripod out there it does seem a little wobbly and not the steadiest. But what's to be expected at this price point it's holding up fine for me I like the face it came with it's own bag to store it in that as a plus the levels seem right on point I tested them with a couple other levels and they were dead on. Don't hesitate on this item.

This is not a "basic tripod".  It has so many features I don't even know if I'll use them all!  2 bubble levels, hook for added weight, crank height adjuster, multiple movements on the head, easy slip on and off spring with spring holder popup to make it even easier to put the detachable piece back in.  Lots of little things like a handle and a carrying case make this an amazing value for the money.  Sure it's not made out of gold but for the price I paid and the use I need, this is a complete 5 star winner.  I would recommend this to anyone that isn't filming a hollywood blockbuster.

I bought this tripod 4 months ago.  It has been lightly and carefully used.  Today I was adjusting the legs and the clamp that holds the leg in place came off.  Don't waste your money.  Save up and get a better tripod.

Came broken(tripod leg) and with multiple scratches and stains on the metal. Very cheap construction, should have expected this from an "Amazon basic" product though. First and last "Amazon basic" product I ever purchase.Very sticky movement when trying to track a target with a camera.

I only use it to hold a very light webcam for a virtual shooting range program called LASR. I cannot comment on if it would be any different holding a camera or camcorder. As far as I can tell, it would be fine and it works great and seems well enough built.
I bought for my sister so she always has a tri pod  where ever she goes.. She loves it!

Great Tripod for the price, it's surprisingly good quality.  I expected flimsy and cheap but was very pleased when I first got it out and gave it a try...and as a cam model i needed something inexpensive that allows me to move the camera from positions quickly and this is perfect.The hook at the bottom I believe is to hang a weight when fully extended to help keep it from being bumped over or accidentally being tipped.

Fabulous tripod! This tripod is light and sturdy. The mount piece is thick plastic and is well made. Our adapters fit perfectly on the mount and the quick release feature makes it super easy to switch devices. The travel bag is super convenient and makes transporting the tripod a breeze. I would certainly recommend this item!

I was nervous about spending so little on a tripod (after researching a lot of different ones, the price is typically much much more than this), but this product is extremely well built and user friendly. Very happy with this purchase.

APSOLUTLY wonderful.  Their are reviews that say they would tighten it but would still be loose.  Was really tight for me I would say they didn't know how to use it because of all the differy knobs for specific functions
Pleasantly surprised with the sturdiness of this product. It beats the heck out of holding the phone to record the games...
When I got this, it came in a package deal, so I got it for free basically. Thats the only reason I don't mind it.Legs- these are nice. They are made of an alloy and are very light but sturdy.
It performs exactly as advertised, can’t imagine needing any kind of name brand. Exceeded expectations.

I needed a tripod for a project for my intro to photography class but I didn't want to spend much since I don't shoot much. This did the job perfectly well. Now I use it with a phone attachment to photograph stuff to sell on ebay. Works very well and is decent for my needs.
Replaced a wobbly tripod with this one. Price was the same, but this one is MUCH sturdier.

The Tripod by itself is working and functioning perfectly and for the most part, the material of the bag is ok.  However, I literally used the Tripod for the 3rd time this past weekend and the zipper broke.  Not too happy with that!

This is a very useful camera tripod. This will do what many don't and it's light in weight so it's easy to add to your essentials. I keep mine in the car's trunk and have a more heavyweight metal one inside home.
So far I’ve used this tripod 2 times & the clip on one of the legs has broken off already, basically rendering the tripod useless.I was really hoping for it to be a good tripod for the price point.

While I'm sure there are better tripods out there, this one is absolutely wonderful for the price. I'm just starting out in food photography and quickly learned that a tripod is a necessary to be able to get the shot under low light conditions but since I'm on a budget I also wanted something cheap. This tripod fit the bill. It has two levels on it so you can make sure everything is lined up. Easily adjustable to get the perfect shot. I absolutely love this tripod
This product worked a few times before one of the telescoping leg clamps came off for no apparent reason.  A waste of money and time.

Awesome for the price. Compact, level within frame, easy to take camera on and off stand. I’m sure the pros have some fancy tripod that packs up to nothing, but for a novice photographer this was just perfect, and I felt the price was a steal!

We bought this to use with our Pro FX projector for Halloween and it worked great, I'm amazed at how nice this Tripod is for the cost, our projector was fairly heavy and the Tripod we bought had to be able to be hold the projector both upright and sideways, this did both well and never failed us.
was ok the first time I used. it. then after a couple of trips it just fall apart..

Great price on a great tripod. It's lightweight and durable. It can be adjusted and the legs can be extended up to 5 feet. It's very stable for it's weight. When folded it's very compact. I bought one that is probably made by the same manufacturer years ago and paid twice as much with the Canon brand. I bought this one for my daughter and it's identical.

This is a great first tripod for any novice photographer. I was most attracted to the affordable price! I have a Nikon D3200 and it fits like a glove. It's stable (some of the reviews say otherwise) and stands tall on the floor or short on a table. It also comes with a bag to carry it on your shoulder. I feel like a PRO!!! - Can't tell me I'm not. LOL.
You get what you pay for. It was inexpensive and it works. Not an every day tripod but great for the money.
Compact and easy to use. It even extends longer than what I expected it to be able to.  I got my money's worth for the item that I bought.

Great tripod for the price.  I struggled with giving it three stars or five and decided to weight the scale based on purchase price.  If you're a professional photographer you know what a top of the line tripod is going to cost you so don't buy this one expecting it to perform like a $150 tripod then give it one star when it doesn't.  For the average hobby photographer, you'll be very happy with it.

I won't even try to add to the accolades already presented in the many reviews posted here. I replaced an older tripod that broke, and this one does all that my previous one did and then some. The hook to weigh down and stabilize the tripod is a brilliant feature, and I really like the handle and case. Well done, Amazon!
Best possible features and great quality for an unbeatable price.  Sturdy.  Used it to mount a laser light machine for a dance party.
The 1/4-20 stud is too short to engage the threads on my Spedal 920 camera.  Useless.

I can give it 4 stars. For this price, it's a good tripod. But the same time I had some problems with bindings. It's not very durable. You should be very careful with it. If you careful - you're good, but if not - you may break it.If you're a professional - find something better. But for amateurs - it the best you can get for this value.

I like that this tripod is cheap and lightweight, but is lacking in the main purpose that should hold the camera sturdy.  The issue is the cheap parts that never worked from the beginning.  The forward and back tilt of the head adjustment screw never tightens and camera falls forward or backwards.  As expected, wind easily shakes the tripod due to its light weight.  If on a budget, I recommend a different tripod or getting something better manufactured.
I'm am a photographer hobbyist. I works very well for my purposes. For the price, you can't beat it. If you do get serious then you can look for a more expensive one, but for me this works great!
I needed this for my IPad.  It’s ok but I think there are better products out there.
It's great, lightweight. Easy to set up. Very adjustable. I use this to mount my webcam on it, so I must confess I've never put a heavy camera on it. Great, user friendly tripod.

This will be a great travel tripod because it is so light. It works fine for quick stills and I had no trouble attaching my Nikon to it. However I would be wary with this outside because it is lightweight, and would not resist wind or bumps very well. Overall good deal for the money though.

This is such a great tripod for people like me who don't want to empty their wallet on a professional one just yet. It's lightweight and easy to use but at the same time it doesn't feel cheap. This is a quality tripod so don't let the low price scare you. I'm glad I stopped hesitating and finally bought this because it was worth it.

It may have worked ok, but it was damaged on shipping. Plastic pieces were broken or otherwise detached before we even opened the box. It looked cheap enough that we opted to get the refund and spend a little more for a refurbished Manfrotto.

This is very intricate for being so cheap. It’s a legit tripod. It’s very light and not heavy duty whatsoever.. but it’s not like you’re going to be smashing it around. Treat it nicely and it will last.
Great and easy to use. It has all the features of a professional product, with a very competitive price.
No need to look for an expensive one, this does all the job and is more than Enogh
Love this tripod, it works great and the price is fantastic for the items quality.
I broke it. It’s very fragile. Now I wander if I can just buy that piece to replace but I don’t know what you call it since it has no manual.

Very good for the price. I've always wondered why tripods were so expensive considering how easy and cheap it is to make them. They probably wondered the same thing too and made one without a huge markup

I bought this in addition to the DLSR Canon Camera and Package which I got her for her 13th birthday.  The tripod which came with the package was not made well or tough enough and broke upon first use, almost dropping this expensive camera to the ground.  This tripod is way better made, feels solid, and my niece uses it a lot.
I really like the quality of the tripod. I needed something for portability and stability and this fits the bill perfectly.  The value is also appreciated.
Currently I bought two different models for my iPhone tripod, this model is much better, stronger than “Eocean Tripod, 50-inch Video Tripod for Cellphone and Camera”
I ended up returning the one I ordered, but did receive same one for a present this month. Used it for pictures and loved it. Very stable and good material.Worth it!

I purchased this product for video shooting and it’s really very affordable in terms of money  , light weight , and sturdy . A good investment if u starting to vlog or shooting this one best and affordable product .

I love all of the features. I can take photographs in any angle. I also love the quick release capability for those moments you just need to remove it quickly from the tripod. I am very happy with my purchase.

I was so impressed with the quality of this tripod! It's so lightweight and portable, yet it can easily reach over my head in height. It's perfect for holding my camera for streaming, and I'm so happy I went with this tripod.
Very nice, compact tripod with bag. Took a while to figure out how to fully extend it. Easy to manipulate.

Con el uso normal, cada 3  o 4 meses para las reuniones familiares, una de las patas dejo de funcionar, parece que le falta un empaque dentro de la pata. Increíble que con tan poco uso ya se haya dañado un empaque interno del trípode.
Bought this a year ago and used it maybe 5 times. Yesterday a hinge broke, and then the entire leg fell off.

I would give this 5 stars if the  side to side swivel was adjustable, there is a know for it but it is either all or nothing on mine. Other than that it is a good stand that I have used a lot in the last couple weeks.  It has a lot to live up to as my last stand (Different Brand) lasted more than 10 years and 1000's of events. So far so good!

I've purchased two of these, one for myself (photographer) and one for my sister (video blogger). It is light weight but very sturdy, folds away easily, my gear is very secure, and it's an amazing deal for the price! You won't be disappointed.

For the money, Amazon Basics products are usually good and this tripod is an example. With easy to use clip tensioners to adjust leg length, a solid head with removable platform for the camera mount, the tripod is a great steady base. It includes a weight hook at the bottom of the riser to add more stability if needed. The finish on the aluminum legs won't show fingerprints. All in all a great tripod. It comes with a nylon carry bag.

Get it. It's a cheap usable tripod. Not the best for getting smooth panning shots with video, but some movement can be done. Good for whatever you may need a cheap tripod for. The only things that really feel cheap are the quick release plate and the thing you spin to move the head up and down.  Hobbyists and aspiring professionals should be able to get some use out of it.

Has worked great! I'm posting this product review almost a year after I purchased it. Love it! Have used it in the mountains, rocky terrain, and inside. Very versatile and solid. Cloth container has held up pretty well thus far. When I get in a rush, it is a challenge to get the tripod in. So glad I purchased it.

For the price this tripod is excellent. Yes it's made of plastic parts but those look thick and strong. I had cheap tripods before and I have to say that this one looks far better than those. If you need a tripod to just hold a camera then buy it.
I love this tripod. It is great value and sturdy. Perfect for me since I am a hobbyist photographer.
Suits my needs as small time YouTuber. Holds my camera and the attachment I got for my cell phone
For a low cost tripod I'm impressed with it's functionality and low weight. We use it regularly on the job and so far no issues but we also don't abuse it.
This is a wonderful tripod! Lightweight and sturdy. Does what it's supposed to do and can't beat the price.
even though the item is well equipped when i mount my scope on it and move it slowly it moves unsteadily and the most important thing is it is not smooth

Great price / value.  Provides all the options and adjustments we need.  Another great alternative from AmazonBasics.Update: at 22 months of light use with just a cellphone in a small mount and the tilt adjust arm has stripped/broke off the threaded section it goes into to tighten your adjustment. Disappointed with the durability.  Good while it lasted.
can't beat the price, will do all of what I want.  I just want a steady base for indoor stuff.
Not really worth it.  The mount is very stiff even when loosened up.  It may require some breaking in or a little WD-40, but for the price there are better tripods out there.
Great tripod at a great price. The best part is the easy clip on between camera and tripod. No more screwing the camera to the base plate all the time.
Nice nice inexpensive tripod to use for sports recording. The carrying bag ripped in the first week but everything else is excellent
I would have given it the 5 stars but apparently it does not hold my canon t6s. It just falls to the front on the top. Everything else is great. Seems like I just got a bad one
I bought this tripod to use with a laser level. Works great and has more features than you'd expect. Can mount and orient my laser level (of your camera) in every which way you can think of.
Not stable at all. Had camera on the tripod with my nikkor 70/300 mm lens attached, and the “quick release” failed, causing my camera to fall, busting my lens. So that kind of sucked.
This tripod is awesome took it out on a trail for some wildlife pictures and its light weight and did fine.

This will be a great starter tripod for photographers. It lasted less than a year (might have even been 6 months) and gets the job done. Took it on a week-long photo trip and since I was using it so much all the bits and pieces started breaking off.

Very nice for my teenage son's photography endeavors.  This is much better quality than the one I have, plus it has some extra nice features that the very basic one's don't have.  I would buy this again without hesitation.  Why pay a fortune for one when you don't have too.

This tripod works exactly as advertised.  Easily adjustable and seems to work well with several devices.  I would not put something very heavy on it but I have used it successfully with a few different Cannon digital cameras and what I originally bought it for, a ProChrono Digital Chronograph.  It's nice because I can use one tripod if I am using it from the ground or on top of a shooting table.

Excellent product.  I was a little skeptical at first given the price of this product, but it certainly exceeded my expectations.  It has multiple features that allow for camera positioning and each features seems to lock/tighten into place securely.  Overall, this is a very solid product and I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a tri-pod.  It also comes with a nice little carrying/storage bag.
Very impressed with the quality of the tripod.  I have owned both Velbon and Slik that cost twice as much and there isn’t a lot of difference.  Wish it would expand beyond 60 inches in height.

I worried about the price being so competitive but this is a great piece of equipment. Everything works great and the GoPro fit right on it. A little over $20 and this thing will last for years. Good quality product.
Lightweight stand that shakes a little if outdoors and windy, but seems well made and holds camera well

This tripod is much better than I thought it would be. My first tripod was the same price, but fell apart after just a few weeks of use. This one is far superior in every way, including the fact that a small rotating lever will raise the camera up or lower it down without having to adjust the feet. Great for anyone from beginner to advanced, in my opinion!
It came way quicker than I thought, and I knew I was taking a risk at buying such an inexpensive stand.  I was delighted when I got it!  It was sturdy and effective at doing its job!
This is even more than I expected and I am 100% sure that it will blow my grand-daughters mind.
Flimsy in the wind, but clean construction, especially for the price. Good purchase

I am absolutely in love with this tripod. It has so many little extra features that make shooting easier. It’s sturdy. It’s tall. It’s lightweight. It has a carrying handle. Much greater quality than the last tripod I bought.

We have purchased two of these tripods, one over six years ago which is still in use. The second was purchased for our other daughter and it works just as well as the other one. Reliable and easy to use.

I was a little wary because I hadn't used any AmazonBasics products yet, but I needed a new tripod for family photos and this had a nice price. This tripod is AMAZING. I can't believe how little Amazon charges for this thing. It's a very high quality and I love it. I use it with the AmazonBasics remote for my Nikon and it's just great. I've purchased quite a few AB products since this and I'm always happy.
I use this tripod to hold my browning trail camera .when I don't mount it on a tree.

You cannot beat the value of this tripod at this price. It works perfectly with my Canon SL1 DSLR. It's very easy to set up even if you have no experience with tripods. The carrying bag it comes with is also handy and a definite plus. Be warned that it is extremely light weight and if you plan to use it for a large camera or a long top-heavy lens, you may want to add weights at the bottom for stability.

This is a great stand for the price.  I only wish that they would've made a better camera mount, which is detachable, and I am concerned about losing it, but this doesn't change my opinion and I would probably buy it again.  If you're a frequent traveler you may want to buy something with a better mount, but if you use it occasionally in your home, it's great.  I like the ability to move the camera in any direction after it's mounted.  I had a very expensive tripod that could not do that!
If I could love this in respects to "rating". I would.Why would you spent 100+ for a tripod when this does everything you need and more? At least for a travel pod, you can't go wrong.

If you here reading the reviews it’s because you’re thinking 🤔 about buying it. Let me tell you, Go !!! And purchase this it’s Amazing 😉100 💯 I’m about to  purchase two more fo my friends I am a YouTuber and this it’s amazing..

Super easy to use and set up. This was used for a baby shower, stayed stationary in a room so it was not used for heavy photography but it was perfect for the average user. Love that it comes with a bag too. I have a Sony dslr camera and it was nice and safe on there
This camera accessory is wonderful! It is definitely worth the price. It works like a charm!
Very easy and convenient to set up and will suit all necessities. Good quality for price!
The plastic cannot endure the weight of iPad Pros, and eventually the iPhone seemed too heavy for it too. It broke after a few times of using it.

I was very impressed with this tripod especially at such a good price.  For the most part, it has been very easy to use.  The self-adjusting feet are a nice touch.  The reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is that no instructions came with it and the quick-release plate was tricky to figure out - but I have not used one before.

My 12-year-old grandson requested this for Christmas and was thrilled, after opening it, to show me all the features it had since he had reviewed it thoroughly before asking for it. He’s a great little “movie maker” and I know this will be a real asset to him!

Great product at a great price.  This one has gone through a couple of baseball seasons and it's lasted like a champ!  The 60 inch height is perfect for looking over the backstop.  It's light and portable enough for my kids to tote around and set up.  May have to purchase another one after picking up a second video camera.
Light weight. works but it's not very good for panning with a spotting scope. does not move freely. kind of hard to get it centered on the object.

Amazing! I love having it. I debated between getting this or the 50inch because of price and this is totally worth the extra and has proven to be useful! It's even lighter than I thought it would be but there's a place to hang a weight to weigh it down if you need it. I love the versatility of it! I would definitely recommend! One of the best things is that it has a built in level! I didn't know that until I got it. It's super convenient if you're shooting on a hill or a slanted floor to produce the best result.
Lightweight, resistant, adjustable in all directions, easy to use.  You can take it wherever you want because it is compact and you can place it in your backpack.  Excellent product.

Sort of wobbles, not really able to get it tight. Have purchased good tripod. Not sure what to do with this one. I will work sort of, but I don't like to accumulate junk. If I can't give it away I am trashing it. I TRASHED IT.

This tripod works well with my Nikon D5200, D3200, and D5100 as well as my video recorder. I haven't noticed any stickiness or problems, and it is more stable than a brand name tripod that I recently bought as nearly 3 times the cost. It stays still in high moderate winds, and seems to resist falling over when bumped, (bumped twice at a Mission and didn't tip over). I plan on ordering 2 more, so we have spares for lighting, extra camera setups, etc.
This is a solid tripod. Good quality, in my opinion. No complaints here. * READ the description (above) for more details about this product. That is all.

I love this tripod! I expected the quality to be cheaper. I took this out hiking through 4 national parks in Utah, thinking that if it broke it wouldn’t be that big of a deal. It has lasted wayyyy longer than that and still showing no signs of wear. Absolutely worth it!
Was very surprised with quality of this tripod. Love the LOCKING legs. Other cheaper pods have those pull and twist legs that never seem to last

Good stand that will work in a pinch and you can't beat the price. Being a not-quite professional but still active videographer and film crew person, I can tell you that I love the stand's portability. I was able to sling it over my shoulder onto an air plane for corporate film jobs in San Diego and in NYC and had no problems with TSA or it fitting in the overhead compartment. I use a Canon 60D but wouldn't trust it for more professional, heavier and more expensive camera rigs.

I needed a tripod to hold my plein air painting box and despite my worries, this one works perfectly. it is a little wobbly, but the box is quite heavy so I think thats to be expected. but if your question is 'will it work with my painting box?', the answer is yes!

I read a lot of reviews that got me kind of nervous. After actually getting the tripod, It feels very well built and is lightweight. As the metal is cheat as long as you are not rough with it, it should hold up. Being a Photography student, this is a very good inexpensive tripod. \Would recommend to students or beginners.

Bought this for my younger sister who is getting into photography and has a large DSLR camera. She loves it and said it works great for her.It has vertical and horizontal levels from what I saw, a convenient carrying handle on it, was very lightweight, and easy to setup. Legs lock and hold, had no issues with holding a Cannon T5 with a 300mm lens.
Working fine on first few tries. If it lasts I wouldn't mind buying again.

Highly recommended.This was an inexpensive purchase for a tripod, and it comes with a storage case - I love it!  I've seen others, and this tripod is better quality and a much better option than most I've seen.  I'm very happy with this purchase.  Go AmazonBasics!
This is such a bargain for a good tripod, has a cover, hanging hook and even small levels. And sturdy. No complaints!
Decent quality. We did have one strip and wouldn’t hold tension so we sent it back and the replacement seems to be holding up better.

This is a decent tripod, its sturdy enough for my use. It has an easy to remove center piece that the camera attaches to. The handle is great for easy turning. The only downside was that it didn't come with any helpful information about which lever and knob does what, so I have to figure all that out. This is a very portable tripod though, it fits snugly inside its carrying case and its only about 2 ft long in the case. Since I'm a college student, I'm sure I'll have to cart it over to school at some point, so the portability is a huge perk.

Product broke within the first year the head no longer tightens down. I spoke with Amazon supervisor because product was 1 month past the 1 year warranty and they thankfully honored a replacement. Product does seem cheaply made and somewhat fragile.

Very niceVery lightweight yet sturdy when fully assembled. Would give more stars IF the horizontal pan were looser. I used for many time lapse videos, works great. But when I used to record a stage play I could not pan smoothly left to right. Tried every knob, no joy.
No instructions. I have not been able to attach my canon rebel T3i, therefore I have not used it
I love this tripod! I’ve actually purchased two to keep in two separate locations. Easy to use and lightweight. Comes with a carrying case for easy transport. Great buy!
Best stand for the price. You thinking about a tripod? Just get this you'll thank me. Simple, easy, reliable. Will buy more!
Bought these for our school cameras.  Construction, etc. fine, but if you want to pan the camera, the head is very difficult (and yes, it's loosened - it just sticks and doesn't pan smoothly).
THIS is an excellent, pro quality, at least prosumer quality, at a great price.
Fantastic! I’m so happy Amazon offered a really nice solution for such a great price. I’ve used it for years and it’s worked so great!

I needed a tripod for some messy outdoor shoots, and wanted something cheap, lightweight, and easy to handle. This fit the bill, and I am glad I ordered it.The tripod itself is light, and comes with an amazon-branded carrying bag. The feet are fine, though watch putting the tripod in and out of the bag as they tend to come off with pressure. The tripod head is fairly smooth, though if you are planning on a lot of long panning or tilting shots you'll want something with a better head. For a newbie though, this is a great starter tripod!

I owned a similar tripod years ago, until it got misplaced. Decided it was time to find a new one.  This is exactly the same as my old one.  The only problem I've had with it so far is that the lever for the quick connector doesn't work correctly.  When pressing the camera on, it should snap into place, but the spring inside doesn't seem to be working, so you must manually close it.
It’s a great addition to my camera.Love this. Light, easy to transport and set up.
I have a Nikon and i will never buy another camera stand. I love this one very sturdy!  Does more than what i wanted which is great and at a really good price!
This tripod would be great but alas I had to return because the screws kept falling out. I would not recommend s2purchasing for general enthusiasts.
I didn't expect much for the price, but I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this tripod.  Don't hesitate on this one.
