Perfect for beginner and you can mount at perfect height. Has good grip & durability material. I have not seen any issues so far. Overall happy with the purchase.
I LOVE THIS!!! pretty good and sturdy holds my canon rebel t3 and my black and white film camera easily and is lightweight as well and very versatile.
At first everything looks fine. When I wanted to shoot the stars with my cameras, the head couldn’t stay in place. Definitely useless as a tripod. No but!

Really versatile tripod and very easy to carry. I am just an amateur photographer, so I can't tell if it'd work for a professional one, but from my point of view it is certainly all you need  or should expect on a tripod.
I bought this tripod as a gift for my husband.  He loves it.  Works like a charm.
I was not expecting much for this low price but it does have some cool features. It fits on camcorders. Can get more than 5 feet tall.
HAVE USED IT ONLY ONCE OR TWICE BUT HAS PROMISE FOR OTHER USES IN THE FUTURE
Not terrible for some applications. Don't buy if you need to video and move the camera while filming. The neck is really stiff!
I got this product to use with my Gear 360 camera and it does the job. The top doesn't stay firmly in place though, but again, I'm just a hobbyist experimenting with 360 videos. It does the trick.

Really solid tripod, especially for the price. Very sturdy and comes with all of the essential adjustment settings. The one drawback I found was with the the little spring peg on the mount platform. It really gets in the way when ever I try to screw on my cameras. Even when I tried taping it down it still would stick up.

Price great im satisfied i just hope quality is best item just arriveUpdate: I have been using this for a while now and im pretty much contented with all the functions sturdy enough and very easy to use
Broke after a few short months of not consistent use
This tripod is very lightweight and easy to travel with. No hassle in trying to figure out how it works as it’s easy to use. This tripod is inexpensive and worth the price.

Useful for an amateur photographer with entry level camera. Addition of a hook is great. Love the ability of the tripod to pan the shot. Inclusion of spirit level is great. Overall, good tripod for the money. I am worried about the long term reliability given all the plastic parts like crank, gear, etc. Only time will tell.

Definitely can't be beat for the price. I own two of them. Both have had to have some light repairs where the rivets hold the plastic mechanisms on. They seem to pop out entirely too easy, however a small zip tie makes a quick fix and we're back in action.
Quality product. I was really happy to see how solid this was for the price. This thing is light, but sturdy. I have been having a lot of fun with it and it works great with my portable projector.
Since this is my first tripod, don't expect a thoroughly detailed review lol. However, it does all that I want it to. It is tall enough (since I'm 5'3") and very easy to use. Very glad I purchased.
Freaking best thing I bought for shooting video! Super sturdy and really easy to mount or take apart. So worth it.

I got the tripod in a very timely fashion. Only problem was that a part had broken off which made it unable to hold the camera straight.I ended up using the bit that screws into the camera, which was missing from my old tripod, so it wouldn't be a complete waste of money.
I was amazed at how durable these tripods feel and how easy they are to use.  For the price you can't beat it.

A brilliantly engineered, simple, effective tripod for still photography, allowing the user to work in either horizontal or vertical mode -- or diagonal. Worthless for video, because you cannot make smooth moves. But it's not designed for that. It's for still shooters. Light. Easy to carry. A super bargain.
Exactly what I expected. .  Quick and Fast Delivery.  Great value.

It's HUGE! I love it! It took a minute to figure it out but once I got it to go as tall as it could, it was taller than me (I'm 5'0)! I've put my camera on it as a test and worked perfectly. Gotta try my heavier lenses next-should help me get less blurry photos (the lenses are heavy). Must have if you want to get serious into photography!!!
My last one broke, needed a heavy duty and it has more features live it
Quick connect broke after first use. Would actually hve preferred that it just have a 1/4-20stud and not that quick connect
Lightweight yet sturdy enough to hold a camera or camcorder.  Adjustable legs are convenient to reposition the tripod.  I would recommend this product.

This Amazon Basics tripod has all the standard features you would expect from a Tripod.  It also comes in a carrying bag as well.  All for $23.  What else could you ask for? This is one of the better values on Amazon.
Great! Highly recommend. I like all the adjustments and the carry case is a plus.
Perfect product for this price
You get what you pay for. Pretty basic, but works. Good to start with.
this is actually perfect for photo newbs. i purchased this for my best friend for his birthday and he loves it!

OMG! This tripod is amazing! I've been using a tripod that I've literally had for 20 years and I hadn't realized all the cool features that tripods have these days.I absolutely LOVE the quick release feature, it is so handy. The carrying case is also great for traveling to location shoots.

I have a Canon point and shoot camera and a sony video camera that I have been using to capture family moments for the last few years. Both devices produce really quality images, but I can never seem to get the camcorder to stay still...until I purchased this stand. This stand is by far the best purchase I've ever made. It is very durable, has many different adjustable heights, and the fact it comes with a bag is just the cherry on top!
Nice sturdy . I agree it is a Best Buy. Perfect for what I need. The silver color looks good too and a great price.

Product did not arrive when originally expected. Requested reorder (at no charge), and it came in a very nice and timely fashion(upgraded shipping at no charge).Product as described. Easy to use, setup, and breakdown. Also, comes with a neat carrying case so you don't have to feel so cumbersome with your ten gallon tripod. ;) all in all- great service Amazon. Quality products, for great prices, and all from the comfort of my home. Great job with getting it mixed up in the mail, INFORMING me about it, and still getting it here before Christmas! Superb.

This is a great product. It does the job ike it's supposed to. I ordered this product thinking it might be too short because I was 69 inches tall. This was not a problem at all. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the last where you attach the camera seems a bit flimsy and I almost broke it. Other than that, great product!

Decent tripod for the price.  Don't try and use a crane or a job on this though.  When we tried to use the rotorig on it it started to strain, bow and buckle.  Its head is mostly-all plastic, so it cant support much stress other than the weight of the camera.The quick release plate on it didn't fit the ones I have been using, so I just simply mounted a quick release onto its quick release.
I finally bought a tripod.  I love it.  It makes it so much easier to take a family picture!  Given how big it sets up as, it is compact.  I wish I had bought this years before!
Does as advertised. A weight can be hung underneath to increase steadiness.

Perfect tripod for an amazing price. I bought this based off of reviews and I was not disappointed. It is easy to adjust and use and my camera attaches perfectly to it. it is also lightweight and comes in a case so it is super easy to transport. It also packs down really small so again, easy to transport. I would highly recommend this tripod for anyone needing just a basic high quality one that they don't want to spend too much money on!
Cheap and flimsy!  Definitely no Manfrotto!  I just bought this so I could put my laser level on.
I love it! It can reach extremely high while also staying fairly low.Pros:
Perfect for teaching online courses. Held my iPad steady and the swivel made it easy to turn the the iPads to any angle I needed. (You will need to buy holder for your tablet separately.)
This is a great tripod and does exactly what it's supposed to do. Its adjustable in every way imaginable.
Its perfect! It does work with our SONY (Alpha 6000) camera!

Love that it has levels so I can tell if the camera is perfectly straight or not. It's lightweight, but doesn't feel cheap, and it's nice that it comes with a bag. My only problem is that it didn't come with a little guide to tell me how to fully extend it and whatnot. After tinkering with it for a few minutes, though, I figured it out, so it wasn't a catastrophe. It arrived very quickly and I'm sure it'll be incredibly handy.

Very delicate..be careful when using but good tripod.  Update: 5/28/2018...I see that some said they broke the thing in the lower star reviews but the tripod is not indestructible and mine still has the components working and nothing broke yet. Gently use the tripod and it'll be fine.

The AmazonBasic 60-inch tripod has been a great every-day use tripod. I am just getting into photography so this is not used on a professional level. Either way, it is made out of aluminum and is very lightweight. There are multiple nobs to help set the camera just the way you want.
It came on time! I bought this for my daughter. She likes it! However, I think it is a little bit too heavy for the kids.
Awesome tripod for YouTubers!! Stable, adjustable, and light weight. Easy to move around for getting different shots!

Very sturdy and I love the adjustment roller for the top part of the tripod. A lot better than the last one i had; the construction is great. What I received is exactly what's shown which is always nice too.
Got this for my son to use in his film class and anytime he is taking pictures.He loves the size and how lightweight it is.

It's a cheap tripod so don't expect much. It's pretty flimsy but it gets the job done. my biggest complaint is that I can't get the top quite tight enough. No matter how much I tighten it down, the angle is still susceptible to change if I push down on the trigger button with too much pressure. Overall, it's worth what you pay.
Perfect light weight tripod and very sturdy. We used it for our wedding and our 1 year wedding phtots. Would recommend this item to anyone looking for a tripod.

For what you're paying, this tripod is unbelievable. It seems that amazon (or the original manufacturer) thought of everything and made sure there are no issues or kinks--often times that happens with amazonbasics items. Not in this case.-Strong

Just received this tripod for mounting my Orion 80mm table top telescope and I was surprise Its better than I expected, love the fine tune crank extension. And for 23.00 you cant go wrong. Its nice that you can use this tripod on a table or stand on its own, also caring handle I didn't notice when  ordering It. Yea clear sky tonight.

Great entry level tripod!  I purchased to hold my camcorder during those "extended" recording sessions.  Works well with any camera, still, camcorder or accessory with the standard female 1/4x20 receptacle.  Wide range of heights and angles for your shots.  Very stable base for your shoot, yet collapses quickly into a small form.  Wonderful affordable tripod.  I can't imagine that I will need anything more substantial.

I ordered this last minute for a trip. The 60" was a bit larger and heavier than what I needed for the trip it was worth every penny (given how cheap it is!). If this one breaks, I will definitely be ordering the smaller size down, but for the price this is an incredible value!
Very good product for the price. It’s an affordable tripod for beginners. Very light weight. Does it’s job.
Does the job and easy to use. Had it for over a year and still works great, comes with bag to store away in. Also has an easy camera detach feature which is very convenient.

After searching locally for a quality Tripod, I found that if they were of decent design, strength and quality, the starting price would be in $60 category so, I was hesitant to make this purchase. Strong and with all of the features that I sought and priced under $30, how could that all be true. Knowing Amazon's return policy guarantee, I took the chance. I will never regret this choice. It's everything that was claimed. Great product and great price.

This tripod is pretty fragile. I had it for less than 3 months and random parts just started falling off and won't re-attach. It has a lot of adjustments but they are not very sturdy. I wish I would've got my money back

I love this tripod. It is very sturdy and well-built. The legs lock into place so I can be sure it will not fall over. There is a handle for easy carrying and a bag. There are also levels on the legs and top which are a big help. I am a beginner photographer so more professional users may have issues with it that I don't.

I bought two of these for a project and both of them broke within 3 months. On the first one of the bottom flat pegs fell off and the second one of the support legs fell out. Yes I knew I bought it cheap but the quality is VERY cheap. Just spend that extra $$$ to get a nicer tripod that will actually last you.

I've been borrowing my mom's 40-year-old metal tripod, which has all of the same functions this one has, but weighs far more. Plus, this one has the removable camera mount, which stay attached to the camera body, rather than having to un-screw and re-screw it every time. Love it!

I absolute love everything about this tripod! It is lightweight and extends to my eye level! It comes with a carrying bag, which I wish has an extra pocket but that’s alright! I highly recommend this item! It’s so useful! I bring it to adventures to document trips with my boyfriend :)

All in all an excellent product. I like everything about it. Simple yet well thought through design. Lightweight. Sturdy. Easy to fold up or unpack. Just an awesome product. Just think the price could have been a bit less. Maybe just a tad overpriced.
it is not at all sturdy and does not stay in the position. the weight of camera and lens keeps falling down and if not careful, you can break your lens.
Have to take the top off to mout the camera and the replace it, can drop the camera while fooling around with it, very bad design
work great with the Acuvar Tablet Tripod Mount (Universal) fits iPad Tablets and Other Tablets + an eCostConnection Microfiber Cloth and phone selfie holder

Got this tripod for my Nebula Capsule 2 projector. Works like a charm. Very flexible with the angles on the angles. Since this item is very light weight I was a little concerned about the sturdiness. But after place my nebula on there it was fine. I like how it comes with a carrying bag for convenience.
This was ordered to use for church.  It is an amazing deal!  So much better made than the others I have bought that just seemed to be made “disposable!”  Arrived quickly.
Very sturdy and hold my camera and I got an attachedment for the ring like it works very well together. I was very surprised on the quirky and the carrying case
Great lightweight tripod. Great value and price.
Wanted to use this for travel. Unfortunately it's too big for any carry-on luggage, and not convenient for transportation.

I've been using this tripod for a few months now paired with my Canon T2i and I've had no issues out of it. It gets just tall enough when you extend the legs to their full height and extends even higher if you rotate the the arm towards the top. It also has a hook on the bottom if you want to attach something heavy so that the tripod doesn't move around. All around it's a great tripod!
Serves it purpose. Yes, it’s lightweight but I haven’t had any issues with it supporting my camera (Canon Rebel T5). Great buy.

I purchased this for a budding photographer in the family.  In comparison this tripod equals the quality of much higher priced tripods.  I'm sure there are better ones on the market,  but they are most likely much higher in price.  I have two of these, one for a still camera and one for a movie camera.  I keep the attachment hooked to the cameras so they are easy to pop right onto the tripod.  Super product for the money.

More than what I expected! This is absolutely what every new YouTuber should start with. It is portable, compact and sturdy. It is very easy to figure out and a great way to stabilize filming. I could not be any happier with my purchase! Oh and the price is amazing also!
For the life of me, I could not figure out how to get the top part to stay locked upright and be able to pan at the same time. It doesn't pan very well anyways. And to top it all of it breaks easily.

So light and slick. Great for beginners like me. If I was going professional I'd probably go for something a little stronger, more durable and steady, but this would make a great gift for someone starting out in photography, or an amateur on vacation or a design student like me who needs a cheap solution to a photography assignment. I'm very happy with the price to quality ratio. Well worth such a nice product.

Very well constructed; more than I expected for a "lightweight". Extremely stable with my SLR on the platform and small enough to easily fit in my suitcase. Will do a followup when I complete my 30 day vacation.
Works well in the outdoors, no issues really.except, if there are heavy winds, its not very stable.

This is about as fancy as anyone would need with less than $10,000 invested in their photography hobby. It's sturdy, lightweight, moves in any direction you'd need, and it's almost the perfect height for me (being 6'4") when it's fully extended. Don't buy the same thing for $300 when you can get this for much much less.

I really am surprised by how nice this tripod is for the price paid. It functions well and as it should, comes with a nice case, is decently compact for storage and travel.. I so far have no complaints with it. I use my video camera with it to record my piano playing and my dog being cute, so keep in mind my use for it is on the lighter side.
Like everything about it and great price. You cannot go wrong with this. I use it for my Cam recorder  and cell phone-Need adapter for phone. Mine was $6.99 on Amazon.

I had an older tri-pod for years.  I needed a new one and decided on this one.  I found that not only is this really light weight but easy to work with, especially when I have to replace the battery or a new scan disk.
This tripod is all that I expected and more. Very good quality. Highly recommend it.

This is a nice, sturdy tripod that comes with a carrying bag. It breaks down so it's pretty easy to transport and works like a charm. I'm impressed and do recommend it for those amateur photographers who occasionally need a tripod, as did I.

I love that this came in a little carrying bag- that is super convenient. I've only used this a few times so far, but it performs admirably, especially for the price! I've used to to make close up, overhead videos of cake/cookie decorating and it it really easy to position and doesn't wiggle around once you put it there. Very pleased so far.
Pretty good but the handle sticks out into the 360 degree photo. Otherwise pretty good for the price.
This tripod is nice and it's light for traveling.  If you're just an amateur photographer and need something on the go this will do it.
Bought it for my spotting scope. It's pretty easy to set the scope on this tripod and the height adjustments etc, are pretty intuitive.
Not a bad tripod at all. A bit flimsy but, decent for the price (less than $20.00).  They handle my Skymaster. 20X80 binocular OK.
The tripod is sturdy, stylish, and easy to operate.  The quality is that of something you would expect to be more expensive.  Great design and make.
For the price this is awesome. Now my pictures come out much better than before.It is easy to store in the bag, too.
bought the cheapest tripod at the time and it worked, nothing special about it

Before purchasing I knew nothing about tripods, but this one was the right price and could do everything that some of the more expensive tripods on Amazon can do. It did take me a few minutes to figure out how to make the legs taller, as there was no instructions included. After that though the tripod was very easy to use, only taking a few seconds to open and collapse. I also really like how portable friendly and light weight this tripod is.
Broke just after a month, didn’t get full refund. I wouldn’t get this tri-pod, paid a little more for a decent tri-pod
Warning: in door use only!!! It broke my camcorder and camera in windy environments. Itself also broke.
For the price it's a really nice tripod!We got ours for a spotting scope. Hook on the brace helps stabilize it

I LOVE THIS! I plan to DIY my own family pictures and this does everything well. I am 4'11 and the fact that this tripod gets so tall I needed a three step ladder to see the top has me so happy I bought this. Good Job Amazon! 👏👏👏

Does an OK job. A little wobbly. I wouldn't recommend it for long exposures or astro photography. It works well for portraits or landscapes as long as it's not windy. Hanging something heavy off of the hook will help.I'm not disappointed, it's great for the price. But do not expect Manfrotto performance out of it.
I’m just getting into photography and this is one of the items I needed it works great with my Nikon camera
Good price , good quality , fast shipping , good for the money.

I'm a photography beginner and this tripod is just excellent to start with, didn't find it so hard to move as other reviewers said, of course its not really soft for moving it while capturing video but if you want to just have to push a little harder.Not as light as I thought so it makes it better... the pods in the legs makes it almost suitable to any type of floor/ground.
Not bad! Love it’s ease of use. Will hold macro lens and canon full size camera just fine. I know that was my primary concern if it could hold the weight...
This works so well and is very lightweight and easy to pack for trips.
Very nice for the price.Sturdy, with lots of adjustments.  Easy to setup and break down.
Head is not removable which is a big disappointment. It is ok for lightweight duties but it won't stand up to much abuse.

I was sad and thought it was too short then I found the crank to raise it even more. Has built in levels, precise control, handle and a bag. The adapter is easy to remove and transfer to other cameras. Super stable.
Just starting out taking pictures and needed a reliable but not too expensive tripod. This one is so easy to assemble and it works great.

This tripod is very handy and it certainly gets the job done.  That being said, it's not very durable--- within one month of use, a plastic piece fell off of it--- I'm not even sure what that plastic piece was for, but it was obviously not meant to break off.Either way, it still works, so I won't be replacing it unless something more important breaks off.

I bought this in a bit of a pinch for some pictures my friend asked me to take. From reading the reviews, I expected this would meet my needs and having received the item I still suspect that it will.However, bear in mind that this is a ~$25 tripod. It is extremely lightweight and not overly sturdy. My camera setup is a bit much for it (DSLR, Vertical/Battery Grip, External Flash, Lens) and the tripod is less than 100% steady when the lift arm is extended at all. This is in no way, shape, nor form a high end item. It is a barebones tripod. It will suit my needs of something to use for group pictures in light or with flash but absolutely would not be usable for extended exposures in anything but ideal conditions (no wind, remotely triggered shutter, etc.).
We need this for our trip to Greer. Definitely came in handy we couldn’t never get pics of all the family and this made it possible.

Wow. I am just a beginner photographer but I ordered this one for some landscapes I plan on doing. It is not the best I have ever seen but it is incredibly nice for the price you pay. It is very easy to operate and provides a great secure hold on my d3200. I would recommend this to most people looking for a great tripod.
Great value! I bought this afte a few mishaps with other phone tripods. This one is amazingly versatile, though not super small if that’s what you’re looking for. Would recommend.

I bought this tripod mostly to take long exposure photos, as is. It does the job just good. My gear consist in some lenses and a simple nikon d5100, I feel that there are a couple points that could be improve. When you plug your camera to the socket it feels kind of clumsy also you won't be able to make it tight unless you really tight the screw under the camera. But afterall I'm quite happy, it came with a nice bag and for the price I feel that it is light.

I've spent so much money on tripods. This thing costs nothing and often does what's needed. The head could be a bit more sturdy, but for the price, nothing I can't deal with. And if you leave it behind, no big deal.
This tripod worked great for mounting a Barska Sky Telescope.
Easy to set up, lightweight (as advertised), stable, sturdy.

This is pleasantly surprising in its quality! This will fulfill the needs of most everyone very well. It is a little jumpy if you were to pan with it, having a rough stop-go rather than smoothly gliding to a halt. The versatility amazed me. You adjust the tilt by twisting the pan handle. You also crank the knob that sits in the legs to raise/lower the seat of the camera. Very sturdy. I'm very happy with it.

Solid, lightweight, durable, versatile. For the money, you'd be hard-pressed to beat this value.  Not designed for rugged outdoors work, or for precision pan/tilt cinematic use. But for vacations, time-lapse, home-studio, or YouTube tutorial/vlogging, it has been great.
It is what it is.  Bought two more for cameras and additional binoculars.  It's good enough if the device isn't overly heavy.  Recommended.
For the price point, this is a great tripod. There is another amazon basics tripod that's cheaper than this ($15), but this is the one everyone should opt for
I took the upper part and made a parrot stand. My macaw loves it

So far so good. I like its lightweight and it is so easy to use. It is tall enough to capture everything when I use my Canon vixia HF r700 video camera. The camera sits on perfectly without any trouble. It didn't scratch my camera when I used it. You don't need much space for it because I use in my overpacked room  and it fits perfectly. I like that it can also contract into a small tripod that can actually be used in small spaces like on my dresser or chest, table and so on. Anyways, I have nothing to say but something good about this product, no regrets at all!
The product arrived on time. The material and durability is pretty impressive. Very pleased with my purchase. Would definitely recommend.

It's perfect! and the features are really cool. The only thing i wish it had was  instructions because it was my first time using a tripod and i was struggling how to use it without breaking something. But other than that it's great for the price!
Got this to go with digital video camera I got for 13 year old grandson's birthday

I've bought this tripod twice, and each of them broke in about a year. The pluses are: 1) able to tilt, maneuver and position your camera very easily 2) lightweight and 3) low price. The main minus is that it's cheaply made and easily broken. Probably worth buying as a back-up tripod, or if you like to take videos from multiple angles, but wouldn't count on it if you plan on using it heavily.

For the price you shouldn't be expecting anything too fancy, but so far I've had no real issues with it. Having said that I only use this tripod for a small camera and not a DSLR so keep that in mind.

Very nice, lightweight, can be extended by a few inches if you want it a notch higher. I use it to record table tennis practices and matches and it fits the bill perfectly. Awesome price too.  5 out of 5.

I have gone crazy trying to figure out how to use my cell phone attachment on this tripod.  It has taken a week and a half to get it straight!  Please try including instructions for those of us who have never used one before!

Outstanding!!!! This does everything I need. It’s smooth and light. All the parts seem to be of nice quality. Great tripod for first time amateur photographer. I’m sure some pros would agree at this price. Thank you Amazon for a well built product at a great price

This has been a great basic starter tripod for me. It works for the light use I give it. It is very lightweight which in some situations is desirable and other not as much. Very good tripod for the price. Comes with a carrying bag. Very easy to set up and adjust once you get the hang of it.

this is an awesome travel tripod, the only thing is it is not good for panorama shots but there is way to do it you just have to get used to it. It is great for star pics and if you want something sturdy to take some awesome shots and you can just put on the side of your back pack definitely get this especially if your a beginner
I love this tripod! It's easy to carry and use. It comes with a storage/carrying bag. I'm looking forward to using it for more of my nature videos and pics!!!
Bought one.  Like it.  Bought another one for my video interviews.

8.5/10 based on the price and usage. It feels a bit stiff so it's harder to turn smoothly when doing videos or panorama shots. Even tried putting grease on the joints which helped a little.  Otherwise it's great for stills, it's very portable and you can take shots in many different angles. The hook for weights is a nice touch since it's super light.
I really like this product. It is light, easy to maneuver, and my camera fits perfectly on top.
Exactly what I needed. Exactly as described.Good buy.

I Love the amazon basics products, This tripod is lightweight and very nice. I recommended this to few of my friends and they also bought it. I am using this from more then 6 months and have no issues.
I am about to photoshoot with this in my studio today and I have a good feeling about it. I am just taking a star off because I found some scratches on the black parts as I was unboxing it.
Even comes in a bag It's an inexpensive tripod that works. If it it fell over a cliff it would break but hey buy another one.

I absolutely LOVE this tripod, I got it to be able to take pictures of myself without having to hold a selfie stick! Although I do have one of those that I purchased off Amazon, it came with a remote so I use that remote to take pictures when I have my iPhone 6S on the tripod☺️. The only thing I hate is that the one of the little rubber pads came off the tripod " FEET " so I had to take the other two off to level it out so it can be a little rocky but that's usually never a problem because I only take pictures on level ground!
Love this stand. Worked perfect and is very sturdy! Would definitely recommend it.
Probably the best deal for any beginner that doesnt have a wealth of funds to put into a new hobby.

I have a small telephoto (nikkon 70-300mm) and with that mounted, the camera is slightly front heavy and this tripod cannot handle it. The top plate swivel motion barely tightens at all, which leaves the camera unstable.Kinda defeats the point of the tripod. Save your money, spend elsewhere.

Perfect for the amateur looking for an inexpensive option. Works great and is every versatile for the price. If you're just starting out with filming or photography I would definitely recommend this tripod.

This 'Amazon' tripod seems to be the same as the Davis & Sanford EXPLORERV Vista Explorer 60" that I purchased earlier, and had problems with. I screwed up the first one, adjusting it without totally loosening the components I was moving. Fine adjustment is less than smooth, but seems ok if you loosen it freely. I'm babying this one, and it seems ok for the price.

This tripod is amazing! It seems very sturdy, however my camera isn't very heavy (Sony a5100). The only bad thing about it is that stupid button next to the mounting screw. I super glued it down so it wouldn't pop up. I don't really think you need it anyways, but other than that it's great
This is really an amazing product. Love the easy set up and take down. And comes with handles to make carrying easier.

Even though the price was cheap the quality is extremely good. I find it easy to set up and easy to fold up. No problems mounting my Canon T6 to it; attaching the mounding bracket allows quick on and quick off mounting.
Purchased for my photographer daughter and she loves it!!
I use this when we have a birthday get together and does a great job because it's so lightweight, easy to maneuver and adjust to the angle you need.
Got this for my son to do some video photography. It seems to be tolerating the abuse of a 16 y/o. Surprised to see levels at this price point which was an unexpected plus. Will update if it breaks.
You get what you pay for, the levels didnt have liquid so I cant read them and the clip sticks but it works so I'm happy

Good tripod for the price. Other reviewers have commented that this is not a professional grade heavy metal based tripod. It's not. But for amateur work this is plenty. It's easily and smoothly adjustable, has a water level for all major directions, and fits all out cameras. I would have liked to see a second camera shoe/adaptor included but I guess for the price its a good deal. Would recommend.

This is my first tripod that has a multitude of adjustments. I've had much shorter and cheaper tripods but this one is definitely the best yet. It has so many options for adjustments. Every adjustment I need for real estate photography. Paired with a remote shutter release you have a very powerful camera setup. Definitely buy this. This is definitely nice enough to be used for professional work

I've had to occasion to use the tripod on numerous occasions and I've found it limited in capabilities. The vertical adjustment has play no matter how tight you make it. With the long lens it is almost impossible to center your subject because of drift in the platform. I also found that it vibrates even with a slight breeze shakes it, and though I was using a cable release, the photos had a bit of blur to them. All that said, for the money it does as advertized.

Nice construction. Yeah yeah, it's plastic, but for cheapos like me, this is the best camera stand I've ever owned. I like it due to its height with the price it offers. Has 2 bubble to level the stand. Really sweet. The construction seems to be surprisingly good for a $22 stand, at least to me it is. The height was able to lift my camera up past 65 inches, which allowed the lens of my camera to be 68 inches off the ground.. That's taller than me! This camera stand is more than what I need for still photography and recording.
Not worth it especially if your a coach needing to film games.  Horrible doesn't rotate hardly at all

Well built product at an affordable price. Many features similar to the professional tripods and all work great. Currently I use this with a point and shoot camera, phone with a tripod adapter. The unit seems like it would have no problem handling a DSLR camera at all (even with a telephoto lens). The unit collapses and fits into the supplied carrying case with ease.
Looking for an all purpose affordable tripod, this thing is amazing! It’s easy to use, lightweight but sturdy and is a great tripod overall! Glad I purchased it!
Works really well. After buying this I seen a few that might be a bit better, but it's good for the price
It does the job.  But for being a novice and buying the bigger lenses that I did.. it’s not going to work.  Already ordered a better tripod.
It’s very light and easy to carry. For the price, it’s great.

Best tripod their is (for the price). I take this thing everywhere with me. I use my NIKON D5300 and it is awesome it doesn't weigh it down and works like a charm. I recommend this tripod to everyone!
Literally perfect! I use it for my iPhone. It extends higher than any other tripod I’ve tried, easily adjustable, and packs light.
Very affordable and yet comparably light weight to the most premium tripods. Solid, with a hook on bottom to hang some weight. Levels. Yay!
Great product for a great price love all the different ways to lock it into the angle you want!
Bought this to do live streaming and it is exactly what I needed. And it was the right price. I use I primarily with my phone. No issues. I Haven’t tried it with my camera yet.

Perfect use for me shooting stills and video with my tablet. I keep it in the trunk of my car so I am ready to shoot! If you have a heavy camera or video equipment this tripod is not for you. Great for tablets, cell phones and light cameras.  I have heavy duty tripods that can stand the abuse of heavy equipment :).
This is a surprisingly good quality lightweight tripod.  Sets up quickly and is quite stable for cameras that aren't too heavy.

It's super light weight, costs way less than similar ones, has only a slight amount of slop in the movement, but the adjustments can be made very easily to ensure it always stands upright, even when being pelted with sand in my off road videos!Thanks for another gem Amazon!
You can’t beat the price and it’s really sturdy and well made.
It’s cheap and it works but it’s not very durable I gone through 3 of them

This is honestly my very first tripod, and what an exciting first experience. Box was badly damaged due to OnTrac not caring enough about shipping, but tripod came in excellent shape. Holds my cameras very well. All around excellent tripod. Not to mention it's cheap. Cheap, but excellent. Very much recommend.
Sturdy and well built. Fantastic price, highly recommended!

My first one was broken -- the level on the top was empty -- but overall this seems like a fine cheapo tripod. Make sure you tighten everything and it should be ok. I will say the exchange process with Amazon was flawless.
Easy to use and travel with, this lightweight tripod is pretty versatile and works well with a variety of cameras and if you buy the attachment.. phones too.
Well constructed and engineered, very good value for the price. Can also take some knocks and is durable.
Great product that will aid you in getting better shots!!!
Great tripod for hikes. A little wobbly at maximum extension, but easy to compensate by not full extending each tube. More important is it’s light enough to take with me.
Excellent quality! Plenty of features that ensure perfect positioning for the shot you need. (Also includes liquid levels integrated to make sure you have a perfectly level shot)

The tripod was not steady enough to hold my camera. I had to manually hold the camera while it was hooked to the tripod. Which totally defeated the purpose of having a tripod. The tighter I made it, the camera would still flip forward.Try does not work the way it should. Very disappointed. Will have to go to best buy and purchase one there.
Perfect. No complaints. For the money a very nice pair of tripods.
Nice quality. It is perfect for my son who's a gamer and likes to record himself being an idiot sometimes.  He has a Samsung handheld and it screws on the top and fits perfectly. He loves it.

Not the most sturdy tripod, but among the cheapest. If you are looking for a basic, no frills tripod. This one is good and very good for the price. I have used it with a cell phone adapter and a small point and shoot. I have not tested it with my dslr yet.

This is an amazing lightweight tripod. I enjoy it very much. It's sturdy but make sure that you take care of it nicely and keep it in safe condition because like with every thing lightweight it may break if you don't treat it carefully. I went with it on a tour to Scotland and used it on many hills and mountains and it was very durable.
Easily folds open and closed, love the carrying bag. Performs exactly as it should.
It is a standard tripod.  Functional but nothing special.  It's kind of bulk to stow and travel.

For <$25 this an acceptable tripod. I plan to use this hunting so the lightweight of this is very nice. It is a little flimsy which translates to shaky video or viewing. Also easy to break. The pan head is not smooth at all. But for the price I'm willing to put up with it until I can afford a better tripod.
Often falls over in wind. Recently fell over and broke. Disappointing.
Like it so much, had to get another one. But this one is 10 inches shorter so I can carry it on my motorcycle

This is an authentic review. I did NOT receive this item for free or at a discount for my "unbiased review." I paid full price and am just a regular Amazon shopper just like you are.Nice, decent tripod. A little shaky but good enough.
This is sturdy, just the way I like my tripods to be and the price for two was unbeatable. It is really portable
Just what I needed for my movie camera. Good product.
Good for price but a little flimsy for actual filming
made well works good i like it, if you need a a good tripod get this one..
Amazon makes darn near everything.  This is an excellent light duty tripod.  I have it to mount Amcrest IP web cams in our vacation home.  Highly recommended for the price.
Don't buy it, you cant change the camera mount. I like all mine to be the same to interchange 2 tripods and 2 monopods.

Definitely worth the money. I had a cheap tripod from Walmart or target and it was trash. It tipped over well my camera was on it and my lens broke. I was so upset.I wasn’t sure how this tripod was gonna work since the last one failed me. Its cheap but the quality is amazing! I’d buy it again if I had to.
Very nice tripod, I’m 5’9” and it was taller than me for my photo shoot! It also has a handle on it for easy carrying and comes with a bag that has a crossbody strap if you’re traveling!

I bought this to travel to New Zealand and it came in a great travel bag. It collapses to an easy to carry size and it takes only a minute to extend it back to full size. I am looking forward to bringing this with me on my travels. It's very easy to use, as this is my first tripod.

This is a great tripod for how much money it costs. Some tripods go upwards of 200 dollars and this works for what I need it to do just as much as the others. I'm not saying it's as good as them because it's not, but I am saying for 20 or so dollars it's the best tripod you can get today on the market. You won't be disappointed. It's sturdy, has a level(2 of them!)  easily adjustable and compact. Great value, great tripod, great fun, and sturdy pictures.

Realmente me sorprendió mucho, tenia muchas funcionalidades, cuando lo use pensaba que tenia un solo uso, luego me sorprendí, cuando se podía agrandar, girar el angulo, si me sorprendió bastante, si pudieran agregarle mas funcionalidades ocultas, seria genial.
Quality looks fine, metallic structure, it's just the rubber circle by the bottom of the pole is broke on arrival, supposed to protect the middle pole from others.
Light and strong I recommend and the most important the price.I am using the tripod with a Nikon p1000 is a heavy camera and it hold very stable

I ordered this tripod for my Sony Handycam.  I mainly video outside dog trials / shows and needed something basic, yet sturdy enough to handle outdoor circumstances.  I used it this weekend - first, it was easy to figure out and set up, felt sturdy while extending, setting up and attaching my camcorder.  It was easy to level with 2 separate leveling measures.  It's light and easy to stow and carry in the provided case.  For the price of this tripod, I am delighted and would highly recommend.

This is the first tripod I have owned and so far so good.  It also provides a lot of adjustability in this tripod.  The only negative, is I can not figure out how to pan left or right or if it is even supposed to?  When I try it is very tight.  I have only used this a couple of times so far, but wished I would have purchased this years ago.
Loved this as my first tripod! Works well with my canon 7D, and pans smoothly.
Very brittle plastic already cracked on me would not recommend
Most tripods are heavy, but this is perfect for oversized binoculars

The stand is functional and very solid for the price. Has all of the usual features, balances, easy to adjust pieces, etc. Only minor gripe is that there is just a slight sideways wiggle even when tightened down, not a big deal though.

For the life of me, I can't get it to give me a fluid 'side-to-side' motion. I've tried adjusting every knob. It's a shame, too, because it's decent for the price. Gonna have to find another compact tripod, but I'll definitely need to spend a bit more next time.
Works like it should! Mount my gopro to it for extended timelapse filming.
Love this tripod. Standard. Perfect. Tall. Adjustable. Worth it. Easy to use

Bought this in May 2017 and it has finally fallen apart. I am giving it 4 stars just for the fact you get what you pay for. They don't use the highest quality parts, but after what we have put it through it did a lot better than I thought it would. I can say we won't be buying this product again, but if you are just starting out in photography or just need a quick and cheap replacement this is perfect.
Solid construction!  So easy to adjust and it goes from small to tall quickly!!
Easy to use and you can adjust it in Justin about any way. Also has levelers to make sure your camera is laying flat and not angled if you don’t want it to.

For a beginner, like myself, this purchase made a lot sense. I am not planning on becoming a professional photographer and don't want to sink piles of cash into something that will not be used that often.This tripod does everything you would expect. I like the way it operates, although it is a little stiff at first. It takes a little getting used to.

It's a low quality product. I used it for the first time and one of the leg came off and can't put it back. I try to return it but don't have time. Disappointed. One star for fast shipping. Cannot recommend to anyone.
Are use this product for my wigmaking and it is very convenient! I feel like it is worth the money

It's hard to beat the price of this tripod but it does have its shortcomings. I liked almost everything about it, the latches on the legs are very nice and you can quickly get the tripod deployed. The quick release camera plate lets you quickly with a single lever, remove the camera from the tripod, nice when you want to go handheld quickly.Where it starts to fall apart is when you're shooting video and you need to pan. The problem is that the joints are all plastic and when you have everything such as the tilt locked down, there's still movement and this shows up in your videos. When you pan from side to side, you can feel the plastic parts that are sliding against each other "grabbing" a little bit. Again, this shows up in your videos as not being one, smooth motion and your video appears a tiny bit "jerky".
For the price and size. Good purchase. Feels nice, weighty and good quality, the bag feels great as well.
This is well done-  so much so that I just bought a second.  Lots of features/options, which I mostly ignore.  The locks really hold, with very little backlash.

Its a very nice tripod for the price ! Very study and suited my needed perfectly as i use tripods very rarely.. and i wanted something for cheap for those rare instances where i needed one... Build quality was very good sturdy and strong!

This tripod is great when considering the small amount of money that I used to buy it. It’s very lightweight and easy to carry around and it’s also pretty sturdy. I bought this tripod to record church worship services and it works great! I would highly recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a high quality tripod at an affordable price.
Can't beat it. I was expecting less perhaps because of the price. But this is worth far more than I spent.

When I purchased this and it arrived, I was honestly clueless on how it worked. I had never used a tripod before and this was my first time using one. This tripod is the perfect height for me because I'm 5'4 so I'm not too tall for it. However, something broke off of it and I don't know what (oops) but other than that it's great! :)

Awesome for the price.  Looks relatively sturdy, the controls are fairly solid and has a little green circular gauge which tells you if your stand is flat.Also like the handle which makes it easy to move, can't wait to use it.
Paid $23 for it. I'm not a professional photographer by any means and this tripod is perfect. Lite, packs up small and has a decent carrying bag. Should be perfect for my needs.
Loved this for the price. had to return the camera we purchased with it so we haven't used it yet.

This is a great tripod for the price.  I didn’t even realize until after using it a few times that there is actually a crank that further extends the height!  I’m just getting started so it’s been great to learn with.
This isn’t exactly the most compact tripod but it is reliable and stable. I’m glad I purchased it.
I like that this product is easy to assemble, stable, good height, light weight

At first glance this item seemed to be just what I needed, lightweight yet sturdy and affordable. However whilst using the tripod out n the field I noticed that its ability to swivel and rotate was stiff and jerky. This effected my filming greatly to the extent that I would have to physically shift the entire tripod just to follow the subject I was shooting. Over all I am disappointed more so in myself, because you get what you pay for.
This product is one of the best that I have purchased in amazone.It is strongly built, comes completely assembled in its own little bag.
I'm happy I bought this. It's sturdy enough  for my Canon. Been serving well. Thumbs Up!

This was an extremely sturdy tripod. It comes with so many options as to how it could be set up, making it extremely easy to position the camera however you want it. It comes with a quick release base, which essentially makes it easy to take the camera on and off the tripod. My only complaint is that it didn't come with an instruction manual. However, it was very easy to figure out myself, given that I have used tripods before.
Finally a product for taller people like me I will never buy anything else other than products from this company
broke after first use.  Poor quality but it was a great price.  Bummed that it broke so quickly
For heck's sake, this is a great tripod, for as cheap as it is it's sturdy and reliable.
Got this for my husband for his monocular..he's very pleased with it.

I bought this as a beginner photographer. It lasted a while but you get what you pay for. I started having trouble wit the leg extension bushings pretty quickly, but it was under heavy use. Great for occasional light use.

I love this thing. It is exactly as you'd expect, and more. It has a level on it in multiple places, ensuring that you'll have an even shot with your camera. It is very sturdy, and will definitely reach your desired height. It goes up to about 6 and a half feet. And the bag it comes with is good quality too.

The thread on the plate is very short and doesn't hold my camera steady. I bought this to put my camera up around Christmas last year, and it worked okay for that, but it doesn't suit my needs for any professional jobs, especially not anything with a slow shutter speed. You get what you pay for, I guess.

When I took it out of the box, one of the bottom pieces was broken which is a bummer, and no instructions were provided, so I didn't know what some of the little functions on it did/what they were for, or how to attach the camera to the tripod, but thank God for YouTube!
VERY sturdy and well built! Love the height. Perfect!

Very high quality for the price. For someone who just needs a tripod occasionally, this will definitely do the job. Nice work, Amazon.Oh, and I saw another reviewer said something about the Amazon logo being prominent on the carrying case - mine is just plain black.
It lasted only 3 months, better to buy Targus or any other better brand. One of the legs is getting stuck and hard to expand.

I would give this product a 5 if it had micro-adjustments to pan and vertical.  Works well and is easy and fast to set up.  Don't forget ballast; stability is greatly affected by a light weight or no ballast.

Excellent tripod for the money. No complaints. Although I have not used it on a frequent basis, since I am not a pro, it has been more than satisfactory for my occasional needs. A professional photographer or videographer may want something more upscale than this. If you just need a decent reliable "basic" tripod that doesn't cost a small fortune, give this one a look.
This is an excellent tripod. Vey versatile. Easy to set up and fold away.  Lightweight for carrying.The first one i recieved was broken,  but I recieved a new one promptly.
Great product. Very good quality.  A bit heavier than what I would like but very sturdy.
Used it with our Gosky spotting scope and it worked wonderfully.
The center column broke when adjusting the height after using the tripod just four times.

The Led Locks do not stay attached and after less than a week of use and no dropping, the lock that holds the legs extended has malfunctioned and slides down to the bottom. I can no longer lock one of the legs and this is the second amazon tripod that this has happened to me on. Wasted money

Not even going to lie, but I did not expect to get the feature that I got for a tripod under $30. The more you play with it the more features you find. I love it and would highly recommend to anyone. It has alot of features you would expect from a $200+ tripod.
I never write product reviews.  But this tripod is a joke.  The handle fell off and the clasp on the leg broke immediately.
Broke quick
Must say I am quite pleased with the product. Easy to setup and use. Will give a further update as I use it in different conditions. But so far definitely a good purchase for a steal of a deal.

I've been using this to take photos of art with my DSLR.  With the camera attached the tripod is very steady.  The legs adjust easily and lock tightly (and the plastic locking levers are of decent quality).Pros:
Love this product to hold my iPad for playing music

Plain and simple, replaced my old store brand tripod with this. Didnt think id be using it so much. Obiously its a must have for film photography, but i did not expect it to fit to my projector. Now its a striggle between the two. Lol. Might hve to buy another.

I have bought zilion things on AMAZON..i just came home and the tripod along with one other 4 times more expensive on was waiting in front of my apt ..Once i opened it.I just put it back and jumped on the comp to write review.No need for review for the money you will be AMAZED what you get.Classy classy classy.I love it.Amazing design..I recommend ti to anyone

A functional tripod,  that works,  but its not my gitzo.  I use this tripod to take family pictures with my digital point and shoot.  I like it because its light and won't care if I leave it at someone's house.  So much better that setting the camera on a stool with books.

A strong breeze would likely blow this tripod over, just use caution. Works perfectly indoors or when secured outside. The levels are a nice touch as then you can see if the stand is flat. Fit my canon Ti perfectly. Is worth the price.
Only have the use of one hand, and this is usable for me.  Making it taller or shorter is easy.

Well worth the money it cost. I am careful with mine since most of the moving parts are plastic, It’s not a $100 tripod so one shouldn’t expect the same quality. But for $25, you get pretty nice product.

This is the first tripod I've owned so I didn't really have any expectations. I've mostly used it in stable environments (no wind, so not sure how it withstands the elements) and it has worked fine. Panning is mostly smooth. Given the price point, my only real complaint is that one of the legs does not collapse when unlocked. I have to pull it down and also push it back up with a bit of force, but nothing extreme. The other two legs automatically collapse when unlocked and go back up smoothly.
I'm actually still getting used to this Tripod, but I like it.  It performs as expected, and happy with my purchase.

Just as I read it on MOST reviews! Sturdy, easy to carry with the bag included. My son is 6ft'3 and someone with the same height that wrote a review sold it for me. :D My son is 6ft'3 and he LOVES it! He was like..."Awwe thanks mom! I don't even have to sacrifice my back for a good photo"~ THANK YOU!
Very flexible.  Not heavy duty, but for the price perfect for my particular application.  Has 1/4" stud for cameras
The tripod is very steady and holds the camcorder still to allow perfect videoing!
Lo uso cada domingo en mi iglesia para fijar el movil o camara para grabar y tomar fotos .

The price is so good for this beautiful full featured 60" 3-way pan head tripod.  But this seems only great for camera, not camcorder. The left-right pan function is so sticky that causes jerky video.  I must return it and buy a more expensive (~ $60) one with smoother pan movement.
Cheap plastic material, is not ideal for outdoor photography/videography, panning, or tilting.
One of the tripod log got struck and not usable.

I bought this to replace the cheap 50 Inch Aluminum Camera Tripod and there is such a big difference!  The Amazon tripod is larger and MUCH more solid (the other is very flimsy) while still being very light.  It adjusts much more quickly and easily as well.  *All photos below show the AmazonBasica tripod on the right.  I am very pleased with this tripod!  My only regret is not buying it initially.  Highly recommended!
Really good quality for the cost. Use it to film workouts.
Working just fine.  Great value for the price.  Seems to work as well as more expensive versions.
One year later, and I still use this one for my videos.

I've only used it once so far, but the capabilities seem they will meet my needs, and the construction seems to be high quality.  I just packed it into luggage for a move to New Zealand so we'll see how it holds up.  It isn't super smooth like I imagine the high end tripods are, but it is very stable and easy to use.

Way better than I expected for the price. Bubble level and sand bag hook are nice touches. I got this for a very light weight camera and it is way more than what I need but the price was great. I'll be using this with my much heavier video camera too.
Functional, but very light and can be a little rocky.
Works good. A little flimsy but does what it is supposed to. This is the second one of these I buy.
If you're in a bind and in need of a cheap tripod look no further.

For the most part, this is a nice product. It's very light weight and is adjustable in about every way imaginable. The only problem i have with it is after the 3rd or 4th use, the side to side swivel stopped being smooth. It has become choppy and has a plastic-grinding noise. Since I use it to film soccer matches with lots of back and forth action, it's no longer fit for what I use it for. I've looked through the help/faqs and tried all the many adjustable points - nothing has resolved this issue.I'm asking for a replacement since I haven't even used it that much. I'm guessing I just got one with a bad swivel.
It didn’t last long but I used it even when a part to keep one of the legs in place came lose. I finally gave it up and threw it away. Looking for a sturdier one.

This tripod is durable and sturdy.  The bubble  stabilizers are incredibly accurate.  Enables the user to move camera in 360 degree range of motion.  I am an amature photographer, and this is a great start to my camera equipment.  I see nothing lacking.
Wonderful tripod for the price!
Worked great. Not HEAVY duty but did the job at hand.
wow- can't believe this was $24. Such good quality. One I would have paid double for at best buy. I LOVE AMAZON!
Needed a tripod to take night pictures of the stars and moon without spending a lot of money!
Just got this for my Canon D80. Set up was easy. Works great.

This is so lightweight which is fantastic except when shooting a long exposure if you don't weigh it down you get a little camera shake, other than that it is easy to use, fast to set up, and has plenty of options to set at different heights.
Cheap, kinda works with Hero 7 Black. Rather difficult to work with.
works well, made well, and the price is right!

Love it!! I bought the 2 pack & we have them set up to photograph the wildlife on our property...it's sturdy & adjustable height, I like the adjustable handle too...I have a compact camera on one & full size camera on other, altho I haven't tried it it says a smartphone can be attached as well
As an amateur picking up photography as a hobby it does everything I need.

I love this tripod. Definitely an entry level tripod but at this price the quality is decent and it is well worth the money. The legs are adjustable and it made holiday videos so easy and without any jerking to be seen in them when moving the arm.
Used this as a speaker stand, pealed the rubber pad back popped the e-clip and replaced the screw with a small bolt to fit the speaker. Wind blown this over twice no damage at all
It was as sturdy as my much more expensive tripod.  Perfect for the price.
I use it for my cameras and my go pro and my spotter glasses also

This is an update of my first review which is down below.  I changed my star rating because I finally contacted Amazon and they sent me a replacement right away.  What I said originally about this tripod being light duty and fragile still stands but if you are careful with this product it is quite good considering the price.  And it is light to carry.  I have a very high quality heavy duty tripod that is built really solid.  When you put a camera on it you know that it is on a stable platform.  But it is not something you want to carry very far.  I also have a small /tiny tripod with little legs for putting on the ground or using the velcro strap to wrap around a tree or fence post.  The thing is you need a regular three legged tripod a lot of the time.  And this one is very good for light duty with a careful user.So I plan to use this on our trip out to Death Valley in ten days and if it does not break I will be very happy with this product.  I liked the first one as it has all the regular features you need but in a light duty version.
....and the little pin that aligns the camera poped-out.
Well built, great price, you can't go wrong with this product.

Great light weight tripod with sturdy connections.  I use it mostly for vlogging but I have used it with my Nikon.  Don't get me wrong under other conditions I would want something more "beefy" but this will take care of 99% of all the work I do.
Love this product. Use it for my YouTube channel
This is the 3rd item I have purchased from AmazonBasics and have not been disappointed. In my opinion, the tripod is constructed well for my amateur photography needs.
Seem like it will work as described however, I received a used item it was as so obvious. All the scratches and wear marks. No instruction manual. Not happy will return.
Facil de armar, usar, guardar y buena calidad
Used this for my laser levelWorks great
It was perfectly fine for a few weeks but one of the legs broke while setting it up. I tried fixing it but I'm not getting anywhere.
Worked great for interviews and arrived early.
For the price, this can't be beat, gets the job done and has every adjustment needed

Love that it is lightweight, has a handle to carry, and two levels. I also like how the feet are flexible at the base, has a quick release, plus the caring case is great. Seems very fragile and must be gentle. So far so good. My students have been gentle with them. I would buy again.
Does everything you need as an amateur photographer for a great price
After three months of gentle use it started to fall apart. This is a decent price if you don't plan on traveling with it. It might hold up for a while under those circumstances.
Super easy to setup and great for holding up my projector
Lot bigger the I thought but still very light
Best tripod! I had a cheap one I bought from Walmart before I found this one & it was horrible. However, this ones amazing though! It’s very good quality & easy to use
This was such a great buy my husband bought his very own. 5 star no regrets
My coworker got one of these & I thought I'd get one for my Canon. The quality could be better but you get what you pay for. It does what it's supposed to & that's what's really important
No hay mucho que decir de un trípode. Pero este tiene excelente material, funciona perfectamente y hace lo que promete. Muy útil y 100% recomendado

I make videos on YouTube and this is perfect. I have a smaller body DSLR camera that I mount on it (Sony NEX-F3) and I have no fears of it falling off. I may end up getting another since my OTHER stand isn’t as sturdy.

I like the adjustability and the fact that it comes with a leveler built in. Very lightweight which makes it easy to carry around but it will be easier to knock over...but if definitely recommended for the price!
I love this tripod. Its lightweight, and well made for light duty. Its flexible as for getting the right height working. Im impressed that finally you get a product the does what it sais.

Seriously excellent tripod for the price. I was floored by the build quality of this thing, not to mention the features. So many moving parts and viewing options, extendable legs and even a built-in level. For the price, you can't beat this tripod. Amazon Basics never ceases to amaze me.
For an amateur YouTuber this thing is great for the budget
Would have loved to had instructions with this unit!  Just found out it could go higher than I thought.  I’m very pleased with this product!
This tripod is a amazing deal, it’s a great product and the best is the price!! I recommend this product, has everything I need 😃 and it was a same day delivery
This is a great piece of equipment. Worth more than what its listed. Easy to set up, lightweight and durable with ,y small camera.
this was my second purchase of the tripod.  my first one was stolen there for it must be good for some one to steal it.

I bought this tripod because of the good reviews it got and because the description stated it can hold a camera up to 6.5 lbs. I chose this over another tripod and was I sorry I did. Two of the legs are shaky and the tilting and panning are VERY jerky. I haven't tried it as yet but I would be scared to put a camcorder weighing more than about 3 lbs on it. Very disappointed!

As described, a lightweight tripod. I really like the handle to open and close it. It is definitely light though so be very careful with hanging anything to it or knocking into it, especially when the lever is extended to lift your camera or phone up.

Great tripod for the price.  Lots of adjustments available, quick release, and very light weight.  I took off one star because the bubble levels are basically useless due to the bubbles being so small.

For the price this tripod does everything you need it to do. It is durable and has a great range of heights for one to capture the perfect shot they need. I highly recommend this tripod to anyone shooting casually or for a beginner cinematographer on a low budget.
This is way easier to use than I feared it would be. And it's so lightweight! I wish I had owned this when I was traveling frequently.
Tons of features, including the quick release.  I took my time and did my research.  I am more than happy with this purchase.
The leg extension fell apart after less than 10 times using it.  It’s junk.

For the price it is just ok. while I like the feature set of the fully articulating head the panning is horrible. Even with the tension knob fully loose the tripod head is "jumpy" or "sticky" if you will, which makes panning an effort that will ruin your video. The very grabby plastic will also transfer that audio to your camera as well. There is no way to remove the head to replace it. That being said the tripod is fully adjustable for uneven terrain set ups, very stable, and very lightweight.
Light weight and very sturdy. Easy to setup and is a good fit for my camera and video recorder. Great price for the quality.

I was really hoping that this tripod would hold up better even though the price was set a little cheap! Unfortunately after only a few uses one of the latches that keeps the leg extended and clamped has broken off. You can see my review of this tripod by typing in "Riley Hawley" on YouTube and checking out one of the most recent videos there!

This is one of many tripods I own--some are so heavy that they stay in the closet now. With digital cameras getting lighter and lighter, you don't need a tripod that weighs a ton to safely hold your camera. If you are afraid the tripod will blow over, just hand your camera case or something on the hook on the bottom an you are in business. Also, when you pack this to fly, it takes up very little space and doesn't weight much. Just get it.
This tripod's quality was much better than expected. I also was impressed by the case that it came with and how fluid the legs were. Very good quality and great value.

Great for multiple uses and varying heights and angles of shooting your live video or taking photos.  Very sturdy and not flimsy at all.  Lightweight and easy to store when not in use or to take with you anywhere.
Just what I needed for our church production, I brought this so I could use my phone to lifestream videos. The height is very good.
wow for the price this is a great product!!

Easy to use tripod. Worked perfectly with our Canon camera. The carry bag is a great addition to the tripod. Very stable. I wanted it to go up a bit higher but the height is still pretty decent. All in all it was well worth the price.

I am not using this as a photographer's stand.  I am using it to attach a Chronograph to record the speed of my reloaded ammunition.However, while this may not be a perfect photographer's stand, I can certainly say it has been extremely versatile in its adjustments, and it has held by chronograph snugly and performed perfectly.  It would be absolutely secure for any camera, as well.

very good tripod getting used to all the features so far only issue is when I rotate the camera it is a little stiff working on figuring out a solution. other than that it is high enough for all my recording needs and has a way​ to crank height very nice.
Sturdy basic tripod, excellent price.  Has controls and levels for all the directions you'd need in a basic tripod.
The stand is as described.  Very sturdy and holds my projector up well.  I love it!
I’ve been looking for a tripod for my camera for awhile without spending a lot & this was perfect for me ! Good price & nice quality

Exactly what I was looking for in order to take my pictures with my digital camera. Light weight but keeps the camera still when I need to be hands free when taking nature photos and other action shots. I would recommend this tripod for the amateur photographer. I love this tripod and it came with a carrying case as well.
High quality from Amazon. Very sturdy, easy to carry around and durable.
Excelente compra, buen precio y de buena calidad el producto
This tripod isn't bad for the price but isn't as sturdy as I would have liked. I returned this product.
Just what I expected, but could be more stable at attachment to scope.

Really useful, has a lot of ways to adjust the camera so you can shoot in any angle. It's not that heavy, and can be used anywhere because of its compactness. I used it when I crossed the Grand Canyon from north rim to south rim and thanks to this buddy we could make many amazing grupal shots.
It is sturdy and very easy to adjust.  I enjoy the two levels for adjustment.  It also has many adjustment where the camera sits and it fits my T5.

for set shots this is a great tripod, extremely light and yet a sturdy feel for its weight.  However, when panning with a video cam the tripod is so noisy that you can hear the squeaking if you use the mic. on the camera, there was slight vibration too. I use this for my Digital SLR now and not the vid-cam, Im happy with it for set shots. I would give it a 4 for the sturdy feeling and portability, 2 for use with a video camera.
Didn't realize when ordering its only for camera. Thought a phone could be used also.Can't use it.
Doesn’t hold the camera well.. very unstable. Cheaply made.
Price is right. This thing has all the features I would need in a tripod. Its affordable, lightweight and does the job I need it to.

I needed a simple tripod to video our children's sporting events. I found the adjustments to the ineffective in keeping the video camera stable while still allowing for a left to right panning function. The same tension knob that loosens the drag / resistance also loosened the vertical rotation. I returned and paid the return shipping.  Seemed solidly made otherwise.

I bought this to take video for a wedding and it worked extremely well. I've worked with other tripods and this one stood up with them. it has several levels in it which is unheard of for a tripod at this price and several controls to control the rotation and they work extremely well. I would recomeend this to anyone who needs a cheap tripod.

This thing is very light, but still sturdy enough to hold my regular DSLR camera. Quick to set up and take down. The latches to release the telescopic legs are a little sticky, but nothing major. Great for its price for not-so-serious camera people.

My wife's a LuLaRoe retailer and we use it to hold her iPad during Facebook Live sessions. We're using it with the Ipow Universal iPad Tripod Mount. This feels super sturdy even with the legs fully extended and the center post fully extended.
I got this as a gift and it was greatly appreciated and is used very often

Awesome light weight and tall. Has a hand crank telescoping center pole which is nice. Also the base is detachable so you can always leave it on your camera. The low profile of the base barely adds anything to your camera so your always ready to go when you grab your tripod.
Great item. Shipped & works as advertised.
This is even better than I could have expected!  Very sturdy and a great value!  Love it!
We use this for our video shoots. Never have we found such a simple and easy tripod to use before.

Exactly what I was needing and looking for. I am going to use this with a V-Yoke attachment for hunting. I didn't want to spend $$$$ on something I may only use a few times. It is light weight to carry and comes in its own bag for ease of that carry. Big knobs, self explanatory and cant wait to use it. ONLY DOWNFALL - it is SUPER light weight so if you want something that isn't going to move while you swivel your rifle or camera this isn't it. You could always put a bag or whatever you have with you on the hook in the middle and I am sure that would help anchor it a little better.
Very nice tripod. It works great.  Easy to use and put away.
Very easy to set up, lightweight and sturdy
Cheap tripod it works it's lightweight but it works okay
Fear price, and good product, came on time

Great sturdy tripod! For how cheap this tripod is, its not flimsy or cheaply made. Its not the best obviously but it works great for me. I love the easy clip in and out system so if you want to take your camera off the tripod you don't have to unscrew it!
This is the best stand I have ever purchased! It is sturdy and meets and exceeds all expectations. We purchased a additional piece to mount our phones on it and we just love it!
I’m very impressed with the quality of this product!!
Just like any camera equipment, handle with care, it will last many many years. Well well made
Seriously adjustable. Lightweight and stores well.

This was a welcome surprise! I guess I didn't know how long 60' was but it was a lot longer than what I was expecting. It was easy to figure out how to lengthen the legs and it was very secure which helped me with feeling comfortable leaving my phone on it. Also I like that I can have it on an uneven ground by adjusting the legs.

Purchased with smartphone adapter for video testimonial use and for filming my kids school and sporting events.Very high quality build. Very light, and folds up and fits in nylon included carrying case. Economical purchase. Surprisingly quick and simple to set up. Very happy with purchase.

I was very impressed with the quality of this. It has two little levels on it so you can make sure you're on level ground. It extends very nicely from the top for an extra advantage. Has a little handle for you to hold onto. I absolutely love this product and I love that I ordered it!
I loved it great quality
Good and easy to use.  But if the product need to be increased some height.
Holds my camera tight and moves around with ease. I wish it were taller, though.

This came free with my Canon Rebel SL1. I expected it to be cheap and flimsy, but it's actually very sturdy. It can be used short as shown in the photo, or you can pull out the adjustable legs to make it a full sized tripod. It also comes with a nice carrying bag. I have no complaints!

I bought this item twice bc the first time it broke less than a month later , I thought maybe my first was a defect. NOPE this item is garbage. My second broke a month ago and I’ve barely used it. The legs stop wanting to lock in place. Do not purchase!

Awesome tripod. It was much higher quality than I expected it to be, and it works great. I'm a tall guy and it still raises up to a level where I don't have to hunch over. Once you lock the legs in, it will not wobble. Probably the best you'll get for this price.

This is one fantastic product! It feels very solid and durable. It is the perfect height for taller talent (which is the reason I purchased it). The latches are strong and the knobs that secure the headstock are firm. This is a very professional looking tripod and for the price you cannot find anything better! I love amazon products (My Fire Phone is really awesome as well).
Actually didn’t use this as a camera tripod. Used as a gun tripod. Works well even though I have surpassed the weight limit. Rifle is 8 pounds and mount is 1 pound. Tripod still holds up great

Lightweight and easy to use, just what we were looking for. Added the cell phone adapter to go along with it and it's a great combo. I have read peoples reviews saying it doesn't hold up. We have had it a few months and used it regularly at family functions or to grab some group photos and it's doing just fine for that.
This is a best buy! It it the lightest tripod that I own. I use it to hold my small Zoom recorder for live recording.
This tripod is adjustable in every way like any other tripod. But its lightweight and durable for a price that can't be beat. If you need a nice, tall tripod I definitely recommend this beauty.

The package showed up very quickly and in great condition.  The tripod has many features.  Lots of plastic and aluminum.  A buyer must take that into consideration when purchasing it.
